Text: Oh, Miranda, stay calm. We still have a long time for this.

Name: Caliban
Text: No! I... won't allow it! Miranda's heart belongs to me!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Pathetic monster, your wish is meaningless.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Miranda's heart already belongs to me. It is an unshakable truth.

Name: Miranda
Text: I can't hold myself together anymore...

Name: Miranda
Text: Caliban, I'm telling you I won't spend my life with you.

Name: Caliban
Text: Miranda... What a pitiful woman!

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby, what's wrong?

Name: Toby
Text: I don't have much time left... Can you do me a favor?

Name: Toby
Text: I heard the rumors, but I believe Bianca isn't that kind of person.

Name: Toby
Text: Please pick up that bow...

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby...

Name: Toby
Text: I can't remember what has happed. When I woke up, I've already found myself in this church.

Name: Toby
Text: It must've been God's will. At the last moment of my life... meet... ugh...

Name: Toby
Text: Meet... Ugh... Agh...

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby—Toby!

Name: Toby
Text: It's... too late... ARRRGGH!

Name: Bianca
Text: No...

Name: Bianca
Text: Sorry...

Name: Bianca
Text: Wh—What are you talking about?

Name: Toby
Text: Please... accept my bold request...

Name: Toby
Text: Kill me...

Name: Toby
Text: Thank... you... Bianca...

Name: Bianca
Text: Will this relieve Toby's pain...

Name: Bianca
Text: Sorry... for inflicting that kind of pain on you.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'll come with you soon, as a human, not someone else's weapon.

Name: Wen
Text: How disappointing.

Name: Wen
Text: Farewell.

Name: Sophia
Text: This time, I'll protect everyone!

Name: Sophia
Text: Last one. We're safe now.

Name: Sophia
Text: Why did I hear the boss tell me to run off?

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Now's not the time to think about this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Run... Where's everyone?

Name: Sophia
Text: A luxurious carriage...

Name: Sophia
Text: Jamilah doesn't deserve this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Jamilah, I found it.

Name: Sophia
Text: But those guards... We can't just leave them here.

Name: Guard
Text: You...

Name: Guard
Text: Just like the leader said...

Name: Chrome
Text: I should be able to hack into that device next to the gate and activate it...

Name: Chrome
Text: If only I can have more time...

Name: All
Text: Leader, the Corrupted are coming!

Name: Chrome
Text: I knew they would notice us...

Name: Chrome
Text: Everyone, deploy your weapons! Formation B5!

Name: Chrome
Text: But we'll only end up being surrounded if we defend here.

Name: Chrome
Text: (There's only one way to survive and become Smith.)

Name: Chrome
Text: I'm going to hack into the gate's control system. Enemies will come out from inside, and I'm counting on you to take care of them!

Name: All
Text: Roger!

Name: Skip the animation?
Text: <color=#ff6633>Move joystick up or down to</color> select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm.\n<color=#ff6633>Skipping selection doesn't affect special events.</color>

Name: Chrome
Text: I can only let one of them defend one way. How should I assign them...

Name: Chrome
Text: First of all, let me examine their strengths again.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is Ace (Rank C), <color=#ff6633>the best</color> of the three. He has never let me down.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is Taro (Rank D). He's <color=#ff6633>quite good</color> and has completed many missions.

Name: Chrome
Text: And here's Dika (Rank E), a <color=#ff6633>rookie</color> on his very first mission. He's still got a lot more to learn.

Name: Chrome
Text: What about the enemies...

Name: Chrome
Text: There's no doubt that the enemies are <color=#ff6633>elites</color> and <color=#ff6633>stronger than us</color>.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one with a lance is <color=#ff6633>extremely dangerous</color>. He's a lot stronger than Ace (Rank C), even I can't guarantee that I will win.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one using arrows is <color=#ff6633>quite dangerous</color>. Taro (Rank D) is probably no match for him, but Ace (Rank C) should be able to stop him.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one with twin blades is <color=#ff6633>very mediocre</color>. He's better than Dika (Rank E), but weaker than Taro (Rank D).

Name: Chrome
Text: Based on the available information, my answer is...

Name: Chrome
Text: Must I sacrifice one of them?

Name: Chrome
Text: Time's running out. I must make a decision...

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Ace (Rank C) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Taro (Rank D) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Dika (Rank E) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: The decision is made. I need to do my part now.

Name: Chrome
Text: (Smith must pick up every useful piece to become the perfect monster.)

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: I am back!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Sorry... Leader...

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Finally... I win...

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Gargh! Why can't I win?

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: I must...go back to Leader!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: I...couldn't do anything...

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Chrome
Text: I will not let my members die in vain...

Name: Chrome
Text: Ace (Rank C), Taro (Rank D), and Dika (Rank E). I will never forget you.

Name: Chrome
Text: Dika (Rank E). We will avenge you!

Name: Chrome
Text: Ace (Rank C), let's avenge Taro (Rank D) and Dika (Rank E)!

Name: Chrome
Text: Taro (Rank D), let's avenge Ace (Rank C) and Dika (Rank E)!

Name: Chrome
Text: Am I the only one left...

Name: Chrome
Text: All gathered up. This is the last fight!

Name: Chrome
Text: (Cough...)

Name: Ace (Rank C) & Taro (Rank D)
Text: Roger!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Roger!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Roger!

Name: Chrome
Text: This is what I really want... I want to be Chrome of Strike Hawk, not Smith!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, I'm joining the battle. Wait for my order!

Name: Ace (Rank C) & Taro (Rank D)
Text: Great! It's Strike Hawk!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Thanks... I never thought I could meet Strike Hawk.

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Strike Hawk... Let's fight together!

Name: Kamui
Text: Been waiting for you, Leader!

Name: Chrome
Text: Follow me!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: I must not fall. I can't let Dika (Rank E) down...!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: I will survive this. I must!

Name: Hiro
Text: Lucia, can you hear me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Copy. What's the situation over there?

Name: Hiro
Text: Don't worry about me. I noticed that you were trying to take Riot one-on-one. Just remember to watch out for his laser.

Name: Lucia
Text: Laser?

Name: Hiro
Text: You'll know when you see it. Anyway, take care, I'm gonna keep running.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: *Gasp*... Never thought this could be the laser he mentioned.

Name: Murol
Text: Nonetheless, the victory is ours. Commandant, we should ask Hiro to bring back the Corrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: It's not over yet!

Name: Lucia
Text: Something just ran past...

Name: Lucia
Text: Is this inevitable?

Name: Lucia
Text: I knew I had to face you all to complete the synchronization of my M.I.N.D...

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui, Chrome, Watanabe...

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, but I have to pass!

Name: Lucia
Text: The Purifying Force. Bianca, Karenina, and a few others in my memory.

Name: Lucia
Text: Whether we used to be enemies doesn't matter.

Name: Lucia
Text: Right now, you are my comrades.

Name: Lucia
Text: By the way, there's something I wanted to tell you long ago.

Name: Lucia
Text: Karenina, you're a lot better than me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ayla, Sophia, Nanami. You are very interesting...

Name: Lucia
Text: I saw a lot in you, and learned a lot too.

Name: Lucia
Text: Now is the time to turn what I learned into my strength!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, you're always thinking, sometimes you think too much and miss the chance. Liv, you worry a lot and make yourself very tired.

Name: Lucia
Text: Two of you are just like me. We don't know how to express ourselves.

Name: Lucia
Text: What we had in common brought us together. That's why we are Gray Raven.

Name: Lucia
Text: Too bad I have to defeat you. I need to fly higher now!

Name: Lucia
Text: Alpha...

Name: Lucia
Text: Right. These are your memories too. And that's exactly why—

Name: Lucia
Text: I want you to disappear from my M.I.N.D.!

Name: Lucia
Text: Right, Plume... You are the last obstacle.

Name: Lucia
Text: You are everything that I have ever accumulated. The things that I cherish the most...

Name: Lucia
Text: I really want to keep this memory if possible. I want it to always be mine.

Name: Lucia
Text: But I must give all I have for this battle.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's why... Lucia, you must disappear from this world, for the sake of Commandant!

Name: Sister
Text: You want a warm hug? Here, fall asleep in my arms...

Name: Sister
Text: God's love offers salvation.

Name: Sister
Text: Seeker of Light.

Name: Sister
Text: Tests of faith are often full of thorns.

Name: Sister
Text: Keep on going.

Name: Sister
Text: God loves all beings, saves all beings, abandons all beings...

Name: Sister
Text: Lord, have you abandoned me?

Name: Sister
Text: I give to you everything. My heart. My soul. My life.

Name: Sister
Text: What is love?

Name: Sister
Text: We are on Blessed Ground.

Name: Sister
Text: God bless.

Name: Sister
Text: Is this what God wants from me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Musashi IX in the middle?

Name: Camu
Text: You may hurt me. But my people will avenge me!

Name: Camu
Text: STAY BACK!!! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH—

Name: Camu
Text: Let's fight!!!

Name: Camu
Text: Fourth line

Name: Lucia
Text: Press left to start, press right to view.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to start a 10-second blitz. For 10 seconds, any damage taken will send you to the last save point.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to view Trap frequency.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to stop viewing.

Name: Celica
Text: Attention Commandants, this mission is a Stronghold assault.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy has already deployed defenses along the route, but we only have partial enemy intel.

Name: Celica
Text: Therefore, choose your line-up carefully.

Name: Celica
Text: We have arrived at the enemy stronghold. Powerful enemies await.

Name: Celica
Text: Contact! Enemies appeared!

Name: Celica
Text: Today we're clearing this crowded Corrupted zone.

Name: Celica
Text: There are all kinds of Corrupted here and they come in huge numbers too. It's gonna be rough.

Name: Celica
Text: They're about to attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Clear Requirement: Kill a total of 100 enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies have been killed. You did well today.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within the designated time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets. Give priority to marked Corrupted</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within the designated time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>You have left the designated combat area</color>. Please return to the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Hey, Commandant. There's some good news and some bad news.

Name: Celica
Text: The good news is, someone sponsored us a bunch of Cogs. We were running out.

Name: Celica
Text: The bad news is, we aren't the only ones after them.

Name: Celica
Text: We have to get our hands on these resources asap.

Name: Celica
Text: The new materials arrived today, but the transport team got sloppy and lost some along the way.

Name: Celica
Text: Could you go and salvage the missing materials for us?

Name: Celica
Text: Keep in mind, this area is not secure. Do your best to avoid all enemy contact.

Name: Celica
Text: Collect 5 crates and then extract. No need to take unnecessary risks! Good luck.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 1/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 2/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 3/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 4/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 5/7. Target achieved.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 6/7. Target exceeded.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 7/7. All materials collected. Mission fully completed.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy is systematically looting and destroying our materials!

Name: Celica
Text: Objective: Protect materials and destroy all enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: This stage is currently being used for internal testing and is not an official stage.

Name: Lee
Text: Gold dust falling from the sky... I was right. Some device is sending gold dust to high altitudes.

Name: Lucia
Text: Metallic dust is sometimes used to cause electrical interference. Those mechanoids seem unaffected by it though.

Name: Lee
Text: They must be the "Mechanoid Guards" Browning described.

Name: Lee
Text: Avoid or attack. I'm good with either. You decide, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: These guards aren't easy to deal with. I sure hope Liv is okay...

Name: Lucia
Text: I dug them up and compared their chassis numbers. They're Goldfinch units.

Name: Lucia
Text: Where I found them, there were three immobilized guards. One of them could be the "culprit".

Name: Lucia
Text: We must find the "culprit" and get to the bottom of it.

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe their remains will hold some clues.

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever made these markings... has got to be the same type of Construct...

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, turn him over... What's that on his back?

Name: Lee
Text: ...Yep. It's a Goldfinch Inducer.

Name: Browning
Text: It's well guarded for some place that's in the middle of nowhere...

Name: Browning
Text: Frontal assault is not our thing... Give them the slip, then pick off the weak.

Name: Browning
Text: An underground facility...

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Browning! Multiple contacts!

Name: Browning
Text: We aren't equipped for this.

Name: Browning
Text: Pull back to the bridge!

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Unknown force field detected. If we continue towards the bridge, we'll get shredded...

Name: Browning
Text: Cover me while I set up a terminal to lift the field!

Name: Browning
Text: There's one more, waiting in ambush... OPEN FIRE!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, this one's different. Normally I'd suggest pulling back...

Name: Lucia
Text: But we've got to stop it emitting that distress signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: They just keep coming! There's no time! Take it down, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee still hasn't found Liv... Sorry. I shouldn't have been distracted...

Name: Lucia
Text: The Construct models outside are no longer used in Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've been observing closely. There's no guards beyond the hideout. Please stay here, Commandant...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm going to copy their combat logs. Maybe we can get some intel...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: Gold... Gold...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: The Queen gives us... hope.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Queen...?

Name: Lee
Text: So the Mechanoid Guards were using these secret tunnels for rapid deployment.

Name: Lee
Text: The tunnels are covered in tin, blocking electrical signals of any forces moving through them.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: Construct... are you a royal guard, or slave?

Name: Lee
Text: You sneak along behind me and never show yourself. I almost thought you were being shy.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: I've decided. You must be a slave.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: The Queen... needs me...

Name: Lee
Text: She has the ability to overpower me... so why is she running?

Name: Lee
Text: Fighting on constricted terrain eliminates the enemy's numerical advantage.

Name: Lee
Text: But it doesn't leave much space for evasion.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Lee and I aren't in very good shape. For this battle, you'll need to access Construct operating systems.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lower performance could cause Dodge lag and other problems. I'd feel better if you had access.

Name: Lucia
Text: If you don't mind, Commandant...

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: My dream... is over...

Name: Browning
Text: I've got to reduce Construct energy consumption... to save energy...

Name: Liv
Text: Please stay by me when I fight.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me take care of the fighting. I'll keep you safe.

Name: Liv
Text: It's unbelievable how many guards are lurking under the sand!

Name: Liv
Text: Browning, you're in charge of the Excavator. I'll stop the guards.

Name: Liv
Text: Guards have been pushed back. Browning, is everything okay?

Name: Browning
Text: Don't come over here!

Name: Liv
Text: Huh? The combat system has security measures...?

Name: Liv
Text: Why didn't Browning mention it...?

Name: Liv
Text: Stay calm, Liv... I need to beat them to change the energy protocols.

Name: Liv
Text: ...How?!! There are no energy protocols! It's a dummy system!

Name: Watanabe
Text: So many guards... If you can't fix the defense systems, get over here! I'm in trouble!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll just grab one to examine.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So the siren has three alarms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The first two alert the guards. The third one goes to a proxy terminal.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This thing is basically useless now.

Name: Bianca
Text: Why are they all kneeling here?

Name: Bianca
Text: ... Besides the battle damage, they're in pretty good shape.

Name: Bianca
Text: More guards... They just never end.

Name: Bianca
Text: Goldfinch, can your people still fight?

Name: Bianca
Text: If I win, you have to come clean with me.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Not gonna happen, because I'm not losing.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So many guards...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let bygones be bygones. I won't follow you anymore. We should go our separate ways.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I'm not mistaken, these engines drive those artificial sandstorms around the Golden Vortex.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But it stands to reason there must be more engines to generate so many sand storms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: My people... probably aren't trapped here.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've been spotted! Better deal with these guys first...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Did someone rob a bank? This place is crawling with guards.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Better rush over, just in case.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm standing right in front of them and still nothing? Maybe these Mechanoids aren't guards after all.

Name: Bianca
Text: Looks like they've got some kind of golden ring marked on them... Hard to tell what it is.

Name: Bianca
Text: What's that sound...? It's been ringing for ages...

Name: Bianca
Text: Da-da-di-da, di-di-da, di, di, da-di. What could it mean?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'm not gonna fight you, at least not now.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This place is crawling with guards. And I only just found my people.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Where is he?

Name: Bianca
Text: If I can flush him out, have his men draw the guards' attention, he's bound to make an appearance.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Ah! Run! Shhh! The Warden's coming!

Name: Bianca
Text: Got to make sure those guards don't hurt him.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Run! Run! He's coming! Run!

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: I'm so scared... Leader, save me...

Name: Bianca
Text: There you are.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...You used my people?

Name: Kamui
Text: Roland's probably cowering inside. There's no gold dust floating around in here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Fancy being brought to your knees by a spec of gold dust.

Name: Roland
Text: You're... no match for me...

Name: Kamui
Text: Whatever. I know you're gonna call in reinforcements.

Name: Kamui
Text: It doesn't matter who you send, the gold dust has turned you all into jelly!

Name: Kamui
Text: Gold dust doesn't just weaken the enemy, it interferes with their ability to tell friend from foe...

Name: Roland
Text: ...I'll just have to kill you myself!

Name: Roland
Text: ...I didn't come here to fight meaningless battles.

Name: Roland
Text: Garbage! Aim at the enemy!

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Shh... I know you... You know our leader Watanabe, right?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...You're a Forsaken?

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Quiet... Don't let the Warden hear you... He's hiding among the hostages...

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Cough... cough... Beware the Warden...

Name: Hostage
Text: ...Finally, someone has come to save us.

Name: Bianca
Text: So... you must be the "Warden". If not for the Forsaken, you might have tricked me.

Name: Hostage
Text: You dare oppose the will of the Queen!?

Name: Bianca
Text: Can you stand, human?

Name: Hostage
Text: No... I can't...

Name: Hostage
Text: Help me... Take my hand...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's okay. I'll get you out...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Everyone okay?

Name: Bianca
Text: The guards have defeated some Forsaken.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They came here to help me...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Forsaken, stand up! The battle's not over!

Name: Bianca
Text: Keep going! The battle's not over!

Name: Watanabe
Text: There's a few more left... Let me repay that volley with interest!

Name: Roland
Text: Release antibodies... and send me more guards...

Name: Roland
Text: Nithart... might be the toughest... opponent I've ever faced...

Name: Roland
Text: Still... these guards... pose no threat to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You put up a good fight, but you might need more antibodies.

Name: Roland
Text: Antibodies... mean nothing... to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You made no attempt to surrender, that's good.

Name: Nithart
Text: Show me your full strength as an Ascendant.

Name: Karenina
Text: Leave her be for a while...

Name: Karenina
Text: I can defeat the enemies safely with her barrier.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! How was Nanami's performance?

Name: Karenina
Text: Enough! There is still some distance away from the main building. Come with me!

Name: Nanami
Text: Alright... And you're not even praising Nanami...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding-Ding-Dong... Ding-Ding-Dong... What are you installing, Karenina?

Name: Karenina
Text: There are so many guards. Don't tell me you're still gonna barge in by yourself.

Name: Karenina
Text: It's time for me to do some improvisation.

Name: Karenina
Text: Introducing my "automatic cannon" device. With it and my firepower, the guards pose no threat to us.

Name: Nanami
Text: So many Corrupted! So exciting! Nanami loves it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Core parts for hacking can definitely be found from these waves of Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami is going to find it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Congratulations, Nanami... Core parts get!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm...? A reinforcement request?

Name: Roland
Text: All Corrupted... Come to my coordinates... Eliminate all your obstacles...

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa! Amazing!

Name: Nanami
Text: Your reinforcements will be right there, Roland!

Name: Karenina
Text: One transceiver terminal is not enough to avoid disruptions while rebuilding the channel.

Name: Karenina
Text: The guards are definitely gonna notice once the terminal is on... It's so damn heavy too...

Name: Karenina
Text: Where even is Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Channel 1 restored in one go... Luck is on my side.

Name: Karenina
Text: Internet channel restored... for perhaps a few minutes...

Name: Karenina
Text: Whatever! I need to quickly upload the antibody's analysis report.

Name: Roland
Text: We can only do two of them... These guards are required for the remaining...

Name: Roland
Text: Quick! Nanami! Stuff the guards in!

Name: Roland
Text: Must have them all collapse... on the air outlets...

Name: Roland
Text: Then their mobility will be limited... after Nithart reconnects to them.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah, Nanami has seen some of the defeated guards came alive. So they were "reconnected"!

Name: Roland
Text: That's right... Seems like only a few of them can be reconnected.

Name: Roland
Text: The influence of the antibodies weakened...

Name: Roland
Text: Nanami... Thank you! I owe you one.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland! Hmph!

Name: Roland
Text: ...Partially utilizing the Punishing Virus is impracticable, huh. As expected.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland, Nanami's gonna bring you home!

Name: Kamui
Text: A Construct kneeling before a guard... Is that supposed to be an insult towards us?

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait! The guard's cognition device contains the blueprint of the Golden Vortex.

Name: Karenina
Text: They were the initial builders of this spectacle in the desert.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...Can we just extract the blueprint directly? In this case, we'll know the exact route!

Name: Karenina
Text: We can't... There's an extract permission, and we only... have two chances...

Name: Karenina
Text: Also, some of the blueprints are fake...

Name: Kamui
Text: What if... we extract the fake one?

Name: Kamui
Text: Bingo! Incredible me!

Name: Karenina
Text: We were just lucky, you dimwit...

Name: Kamui
Text: That wimp has absorbed the gold dust, and that's why it became that strong...

Name: Kamui
Text: It's gonna be a tough battle...

Name: Kamui
Text: Not like it's going to stop me! Let's duke it out!

Name: Kamui
Text: If we defeat them all and collect some gold dust, we may be able to cut it down to size.

Name: Kamui
Text: Still, I need to build an equipment to spread the gold dust into the air...

Name: Kamui
Text: Man, I'm not made for this kinda work...

Name: Roland
Text: The opera of the Punishing Virus... begins...

Name: Roland
Text: All your security programs make no difference.

Name: Roland
Text: Be prepared for doom, Golden Vortex.

Name: Roland
Text: Still gonna resist...?

Name: Master-Control Program
Text: Power system crashed... Eliminating... eliminating errors...

Name: Kamui
Text: Have they noticed Nanami?

Name: Karenina
Text: Obviously! Cut the crap and come with me to protect Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hurry up! Connect the guard's system for me!

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami is isolated and helpless, I have to get in and help her!

Name: Kamui
Text: Just put on the bio-booster arms found by Nanami! I can feel the tremendous power inside them!

Name: Kamui
Text: I should try them on the Queen's guards later!

Name: Kamui
Text: But first, I need to test the arms' strength...

Name: Karenina
Text: The only place defended by the Queen's royal guards within the whole Golden Vortex is the Queen's bedchamber.

Name: Kamui
Text: I hope their strength is worthy of their title!

Name: The Queen's Royal Guard
Text: How dare you trespass on the Queen's prohibited zone... Pay with your lives!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Nanami is going to meet Commandant real soon!

Name: Karenina
Text: But what about the front door?

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't worry. I can pry it open with one hand!

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't let go of any of them! Destroy them all!

Name: Nithart
Text: Commandant! This is your last chance!

Name: Nithart
Text: If you abandon those Constructs now, I can spare your life!

Name: Nanami
Text: There's a traitor among Nithart's guards... Nanami has met it before. It owns the door key...

Name: Lucia
Text: Traitor? Nanami, you...?

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami has once connected to Nithart's network for a short time. If she says there's a key, there must be one.

Name: Nanami
Text: It used to be a Construct. The hole in its security system allowed it to shortly get rid of Nithart's control...

Name: Lucia
Text: Scatter! Find the Construct guard! Find the traitor!

Name: Lee
Text: I've just hacked into it, but I couldn't find any keys...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't give up! Bianca also found a Construct guard, let's go there now!

Name: Lee
Text: Successfully hacked... but still there's no key in it...

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't ever think about hiding that from me!

Name: Nithart
Text: Guards! Quick! Obliterate the traitor with the key!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Thank you for releasing me from Nithart's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Too many guards here. No point wasting my energy with them...

Name: Karenina
Text: We can operate them to battle after transferring their control to my virtual control console...

Name: Karenina
Text: But I can only build one virtual control console with the materials I have...

Name: Karenina
Text: One virtual control console can only hijack one guard's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Which one should we choose?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I see Nanami on the platform far from our right side...

Name: Lee
Text: She must have dropped into the wrong tunnel and eventually fell there.

Name: Lee
Text: She's not the type to keep quiet.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out, Nithart's guards are coming at us through the other entrance.

Name: Lucia
Text: She won't let go of us easily. So get ready to fight!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Nanami is fighting alone, please closely monitor her frame's condition...

Name: Nithart
Text: Look what I've got you...

Name: Nithart
Text: Exhibit again that conceit you've shown me before, or my guards will turn you into scrap.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Most cunning. Thankfully, I'm her opponent.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to return to Commandant as quickly as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's the last...

Name: Nithart
Text: Destroy her! This is an order from the Queen! Destroy her!

Name: Kamui
Text: The virus has damaged the security process of the energy system. Our hacking is going well so far!

Name: Kamui
Text: Implant the "anti-virus programs"...

Name: Kamui
Text: If we're able to send these anti-virus programs to the corrupted zone, the infection speed will be greatly slowed down...

Name: Kamui
Text: I've already defeated two Corrupted outside...

Name: Kamui
Text: Keep pushing! Don't lose to "yourself," Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: The corrupted zone is ahead...

Name: Kamui
Text: This should buy some time for the Gray Raven, right?

Name: Karenina
Text: Unable to open?! What does that mean! I managed to crack into it...

Name: Lee
Text: That's because your crack is one-way only. You can only open all security doors if you execute the crack.

Name: Lee
Text: But in that case, the guards can also get in and surround us.

Name: Lee
Text: So, apart from an "open door"" function, we need a ""close door" one as well. The two actions must be done at the same time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Easy-peasy! I can connect the two cracking devices to the same "repeater". Problem solved.

Name: Lee
Text: Well, repeating is the easy part. The difficult part is that the second cracking device has to connect the "closing" system.

Name: Lee
Text: As door opening and door closing are two separate systems, we can only crack it one by one.

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia and the others are defending against the guards outside. We have to crack the door closing system quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: You need to be quick. As more and more guards are trying to break through the exterior wall, they will break through our defense soon...

Name: Karenina
Text: Right... But why did the crack fail? Definitely nothing to do with my devices.

Name: Lee
Text: Yes, Nithart crashed the system on purpose while we were cracking. That's why it failed.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll connect the door closing system to my virtual console. If she does that again, she'll be redirected to it.

Name: Karenina
Text: Operating the final crack... Security doors opened...

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Everyone, through the security door! Quick!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: Okay. Operating the final crack... Security doors closed...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch your front and back, the guards are tightening the encirclement...

Name: Lucia
Text: We have to destroy them all to prevent them from attacking the rescue aircraft.

Name: Bianca
Text: The royal guards are very difficult to handle. If we don't want to be attacked from both sides, we'd better concentrate our firepower on one side first.

Name: Karenina
Text: Commandant, quick! Which side! I'm gonna blow them all to smithereens!

Name: Lucia
Text: Nithart... she turned off the external sensorium of her frame.

Name: Lee
Text: She and the royal guards have already fused into one. Even if we concentrate our firepower on her, we'll still be unable to interrupt the guards' attack.

Name: Karenina
Text: Just blow 'em all up!

Name: Nanami
Text: Can we attack now? Nanami wants to fight!

Name: Bianca
Text: The Golden Vortex will turn into an inferno soon. We'd better go now. We can't let Nithart be on our way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, let's make a clean break with Nithart.

Name: Lee
Text: It's about time.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Lee
Text: We can't keep Commandant and Liv waiting.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukuku!

Name: Lee
Text: Phew... Okay, that should be enough.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukukukukukuuu...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Merry Christmas to you all as well.

Name: Elite Corrupted
Text: Urgh—Uuurgh!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa, so many bad boys here. Nanami is a good girl who refuses to resort to brute force!

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I should cut more trees quietly without being noticed by them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Go!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm, it looks good, and is far from the Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if I emit some noises, they won't notice when they're cutting trees, right?

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay! Start!

Name: Nanami
Text: These guys... They're just cutting at nothing now, but still aren't stopping...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's getting boring. Nanami's bringing the Christmas tree back! Bye bye!

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30><color=#ff0000>1!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50><color=#ff0000>2!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50>3!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=70><color=#ffff00>Go!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=80><color=#ff0000>Stop!</color></size>

Name: Karenina
Text: The door blocks our way.

Name: Karenina
Text: What a nuisance. Just bomb 'em with the bugs!

Name: Karenina
Text: Lucia came up with the plan anyway, so she should be the one who has to take care of the consequences.

Name: Karenina
Text: I'll ring the bell before those boomboxes arrive.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hold on, the bell is so rotten that even a single touch will ruin it!

Name: Karenina
Text: Well, I don't care. At least the firework can start on time.

Name: Kamui
Text: The Gray Raven folks are so cold. They're all celebrating Christmas together without inviting me!

Name: Kamui
Text: I even prepared some gifts for them! Since I'm not invited...

Name: Kamui
Text: Let me sneak in from the roof to surprise them...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? What are those Corrupted doing? Do they also celebrate Christmas?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku... Kuuu...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—

Name: Kamui
Text: Kuroro? How did you become so tiny?

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow, you guys are picking on the weak!

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't be afraid! I'm coming to rescue you!

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright, all Corrupted were gone. Are you okay, buddy?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku—ku? Kuku, kuku!!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? No need to thank me! It was nothing, hahaha!

Name: Kamui
Text: This is—a Santa Claus costume. Are you going to give it to me as a thank-you gift?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Great! That's exactly what I want!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukuku?

Name: Kamui
Text: You should leave too, so that you don't get bullied by the Corrupted again, buddy!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Thanks! Merry Christmas! Bye—

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, that Corrupted that has been acting as a leader is about to run off. Let's go after it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Save your breath. Commandant and I won't spare any single one of Corrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: Still late... Tch!

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Something has exposed my location for sure.

Name: Lucia
Text: Never mind, I was just talking to myself.

Name: Sophia
Text: I didn't know consciousness connection would be that different from usual.

Name: Lee
Text: I'm like Commandant's little doll. Please take good care of us, will you?

Name: Sophia
Text: Wait... In this sense...

Name: Lee
Text: It seems that the connection between Commandant and here is over. We'll search this area shortly.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll give it my all, Commandant!

Name: Ayla
Text: Speaking of which, Commandant, have you noticed that some of our voice messages weren't censored?

Name: Ayla
Text: Perhaps it can be used to recognize our true identities.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Will recognizing who we are... really help us get through this situation?

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, it seems you have to change your connection target.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Will the next guy find Commandant?

Name: Ayla
Text: Not sure, but we've already narrowed down the range of searching area. We should be able to calculate Commandant's location very soon.

Name: Ayla
Text: I'll see you at that place, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Consciousness connection...

Name: Liv
Text: In a nutshell, Commandant exists within my body in addition to ■■■■■, right?

Name: Liv
Text: Let us show you the power of the trio, Corrupted!

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, It's the message from ■■■■■. I'll go to the rendezvous point too.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, wait for me!

Name: Vera
Text: I'll repeat the rules, just for you.

Name: Vera
Text: Those standing before you are the Constructs closest to you.

Name: Vera
Text: The reason they become like this is because of your cognitive bias.

Name: Vera
Text: Next, I'll ask questions like which one is the real Liv and which one is the real Kamui.

Name: Vera
Text: What you need to do is to point out their true identities.

Name: Vera
Text: Of course, it'd be great if you're right. But if you're wrong—

Name: Vera
Text: Nozzle comes close to initiating a self-destruct sequence. This will damage you and the Constructs.

Name: Vera
Text: Humph, are you really be able to recognize each of them? I look forward to your performance.

Name: Vera
Text: What? This is...!

Name: Vera
Text: Wrong. That's a pity. Your Constructs will get hurt if you don't pay more attention.

Name: Vera
Text: First Question. Which one is Kamui?

Name: Vera
Text: Correct, though it's merely a simple one.

Name: Vera
Text: Second question. Which one is Liv?

Name: Vera
Text: Correct. As expected, that humility has made it too obvious.

Name: Vera
Text: Third question. Which one is Bianca?

Name: Vera
Text: How does it feel like to be mistaken for Watanabe, your sworn enemy?

Name: Vera
Text: No need to overreact. I've been watching it from the very beginning.

Name: Vera
Text: Fourth question. Which one is Ayla?

Name: Vera
Text: No fun. When she said association, the answer nearly came to the surface.

Name: Vera
Text: Fifth question. Which one is Chrome?

Name: Vera
Text: That said, Chrome appearing in this place really surprised me. I thought he was preparing for the next special mission.

Name: Vera
Text: Sixth Question. Which one is Lee?

Name: Vera
Text: Well, as you've excluded all deceptive answers, it's no surprise that you chose the correct one.

Name: Vera
Text: Why don't you give scythes a shot? You seem to be a great scythe wielder.

Name: Vera
Text: After all, nothing is hard for you... Hah.

Name: Vera
Text: Seventh question. Which one is Karenina... To be honest, I don't want to go on like this either. The rest are all super simple ones.

Name: Vera
Text: Uh... Alright alright. Correct. All words coming from this mouth would be censored by the connection system.

Name: Vera
Text: The last question. Which one is Lucia? Press the confirm button <color=#ff6633>now</color> to finish this game.

Name: Vera
Text: Why don't you act? Lucia stood right there. You didn't fall asleep, did you?

Name: Vera
Text: ...What!?

Name: Vera
Text: That's not Lucia... Hahahaha, so you really can recognize her. Hahaha!

Name: Vera
Text: Perfect. You're right...

Name: Vera
Text: ...For hell's sake. I knew it. The bond between commandant and Construct is but a joke.

Name: Vera
Text: How can you not recognize the Construct staying by your side all the time?

Name: Vera
Text: No way. How can you pick this one? You're not a moron, aren't you?

Name: Vera
Text: Fine...

Name: Vera
Text: Lu... Musashi, catch that Nozzle!
Here, Commandant!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hey, Akdilek girl, what are you doing...?

Name: Sophia
Text: Sorry, my hand slipped.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Causing troubles instead of killing me, huh... Lucky that you're a Support type.

Name: Sophia
Text: Sophia doesn't understand what you are talking about.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Whatever... Keep pretending.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But you can't keep hiding. We have big guys coming.

Name: Sophia
Text: As expected, they are Attacker Constructs. Very old models though.

Name: Watanabe
Text: What exactly are you planning?

Name: Lucia
Text: Can I use these leaves?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Yeah, they still have a bitter taste, but I guess we don't have a better option.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We need more though. These aren't enough.

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted spotted. Let's get rid of them first.

Name: Lucia
Text: I never knew there were plants in the desert.

Name: Liv
Text: I feel sorry for these plants...

Name: Lee
Text: I bet these leaves have never thought they would get picked in a desert.

Name: Lucia
Text: I wonder what kind of zongzi Lucia would like?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I think red bean will be a great addition to the zongzi.

Name: Lee
Text: The leaves are a bit annoying, but zongzi contain meat and rice, making them a great food.

Name: Changyu
Text: This Corrupted... I knew it...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Focus on the Corrupted around you. You could easily die if you get distracted.

Name: Changyu
Text: Yes! Got it.

Name: System Voice
Text: Truth or dare!

Name: System Voice
Text: Answer the other person's question within the time limit!

Name: System Voice
Text: If you can't answer, or refuse to... You'll have to perform a daring forfeit!

Name: Liv
Text: So this is like a mind training, where Liv must answer Commandant's questions. I will do my best!

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: What's your fondest wish?

Name: Liv
Text: To defeat Punishing Virus and take back the Earth.

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: What will you do if your most important person argues with you?

Name: Liv
Text: Could it be... I have done something wrong? I'll try to correct my mistake, and apologize to Com—to that person, I mean.

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: Which type of boyfriend do you prefer: cat or dog?

Name: Liv
Text: Huh...? What do you mean by cat and dog...?

Name: Kamui
Text: An animal as boyfriend...?

Name: Lee
Text: No way.

Name: System Voice
Text: Too bad! You failed to answer within the time limit! You must face a forfeit!

Name: Liv
Text: The ammo of my Levi-Gun has all become water... Is it because we are in a game?

Name: Lee
Text: It's a game from the Golden Age. The questions are probably based on the pop culture of that era.

Name: Liv
Text: I see. I need a better understanding of the Golden Age culture to answer these questions.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me connect to the old human database... Alright. Liv will be able to answer any question now!
Here comes the first question—
<color=#ff0000>What is the most horrible thing you have ever done to Commandant?</color>

Name: Liv
Text: What?! How can there be such a question? How did it know...
Countdown: 3—2—

Name: Liv
Text: Argh... I-I once took away the snacks that Commandant hid in the room!
The second question is—
<color=#ff0000>Tell us one thing that you regret the most.</color>

Name: Liv
Text: ...There are many of them. I can't really tell them all...
Hmm... Let's skip this question then.
Last question: <color=#ff0000>Tell us one thing that you absolutely don't want Commandant to know!</color>

Name: Liv
Text: Absolutely...not...

Name: Kamui
Text: Liv, are you alright? Your face looks really red.

Name: Liv
Text: I... I choose the dare!

Name: Nanami
Text: Here—comes—Nanami!

Name: Lee
Text: You just put your personal data in here... That was so risky.

Name: Lee
Text: I trust you have heard us. They are very important, so you must not break them.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami found them! Don't stop Nanami!

Name: Watermelon
Text: The watermelon has a metallic shine. This must be the "mission item" that Liv mentioned.

Name: Surfboard
Text: There's a line printed on it: "A rare item that was used by humans to tame the tide in early days."

Name: Yellow Duck
Text: The yellow duck may be late, but it will never be absent.

Name: Starry Floatie
Text: Good-looking, but not too practical. Maybe a bit rough.

Name: Sand Castle
Text: Once a majestic project, but now it's in ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: Those monsters...aren't targeting us.

Name: Lee
Text: They are moving toward the mission items!

Name: Kamui
Text: Why would they want to destroy game items?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami only put us in the game. I didn't control their actions.

Name: Lee
Text: Perhaps there's something in the watermelon. Let's stop them first.

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Warning! Illegal hacking attempt detected!</color>

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Illegal hacking attempt detected! Illegal hacking attempt detected!</color>

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Activating self-destruction...</color>

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh no! The watermelon is going to be destroyed!

Name: Liv
Text: Leave it to me. I'll put out the fire!

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Nozzle? I guess I'll... take a closer look.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Unauthorized party is approaching this unit.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Dodge mode, on.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Set fire, set fire.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Burn!

Name: Firefighter
Text: Emergency dodge.

Name: Firefighter
Text: The road of arson will never come to an end.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Cannot be stopped by you.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Non-combustible material, worthless.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Combustible material found, ready to recycle.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Adding, reprocessing, adding, reprocessing.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Making fire accelerants.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Flame, flame, flame.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Flame road.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Dancing in the blazing fire.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Burn them all.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Transporting.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Please input a spraying command.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Paint forward or backward?

Name: Nozzle
Text: Is that, an attack command?

Name: Nozzle
Text: Roger.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Please specify the next spraying zone.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attack command, accepted.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Reboot required, please enter a command.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Defense command, accepted.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attack.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Nozzle, activated.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attacking.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Execute, command.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Who's there...

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Human... Right, my duty is not yet completed.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Keep carrying out, security work.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: I can't let the virus cut off my way towards the future.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Command, understood.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Death to all who stand in my way—!

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Warning, internal circuit error. Warning, internal circuit error.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Musashi IX, activated.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Battle.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Please specify the target to guard.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Terrapod, on.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Auto battle mode, on.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Defense mode, ready.

Text: Scanning the battlefield, enemy info collected.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Bomb: Explodes on death, dealing small area damage.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Radiation: Deals radiation damage to nearby enemies.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Agile: Greatly increases movement speed.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Closed Loop: Has a shield surrounded to significantly reduce damage taken.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: ATK Boost: Greatly increases ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Berserk: Greatly increases desire to attack and damage dealt while lowering its DEF.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Flash: Can blink to the target location.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Recovery: Restores a small amount of HP over time.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Penetration: Attacks also apply a stackable defense down effect.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lone Wolf: Becomes stronger with fewer enemy units.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lightning Shield: Has a chance to call down a lightning strike upon the attacker when being damaged.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Commander: Becomes stronger with more enemy units around it.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Broken Armor: All DMG taken increased significantly.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: ATK Reduction: Lowers its ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Flame: Burns nearby targets and attacks have an extra chance to inflict Burn.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Freeze: Lowers closing targets' speed and attacks have a chance to slow or freeze the targets.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shadow: Attacks cause Dark Elemental DMG, having a chance to stun the target.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Icicle: Unleashes an ice pile to track its target and deal damage on contact.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Stealth: Disappears for a brief time and moves away from the target after attacking.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Barrier: Creates a shield at the start of battle to block all damage until it is broken.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shield: Periodically creates a small shield that lasts for 3s or disappears upon taking a specific amount of damage.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lightning Mine: Attacks have a chance to attach a bomb to the target, exploding after a short time.

Name: Celica
Text: Signal Orb Drop: Acquires a random Signal Orb when attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Explosive Bugs Infest: Explosive Bugs will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Lightning Formation: The lightning formation will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Flame Trail: The flame trail will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge can stop all skills other than Signature Move. Use it to avoid damage.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodged successfully! Please complete your mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge consumes the dodge gauge. Construct will overheat when the dodge gauge is exhausted.

Name: Celica
Text: Move and dodge to avoid consecutive enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep dodging until you are overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct is unable to dodge for 2s when overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct will enter Matrix under special conditions.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> the moment before you are hit to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies are slowed down in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Now please complete the mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct skills are enhanced in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Trigger EX Dodge.

Name: Celica
Text: A glowing Signal Orb means it is enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: When you ping any glowing Signal Orbs, the skill will have the same damage and effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Take advantage of having multiple Constructs to dodge enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix has a 10s cooldown for each Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, the dodge gauge will still be restored.

Name: Celica
Text: When a Construct overheats, you can switch to another one.

Name: Celica
Text: When you switch to a new Construct, the dodge gauge will not be affected by the previous Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: Matrix cooldown is not shared among the Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can continue to attack or catch your breath.

Name: Celica
Text: You can switch Constructs now.

Name: Celica
Text: Newly switched Construct has maximum dodge gauge and is able to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack is the primary means of attack for Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack will give Constructs a random Signal Orb. Tap to ping it to unleash a corresponding skill.

Name: Celica
Text: Become familiar with the skills and learn how to chain them to fight effectively.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, please trigger the Blue 3-Ping Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: After triggering a 3-Ping, tap to trigger a QTE Skill of the corresponding color.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has various means of attack and skills to increase damage

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has certain crowd control skills to help in attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct can enhance their Basic Attack or skill effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Constructs also have powerful damage skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct can repair other Constructs, enhancing your team's durability.

Name: Celica
Text: Some skills can heal damaged allies and yourself.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct has crowd control skills to help you get the upper hand in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can attract enemy attacks and soak up damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct will have DEF boost or survival skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct has crowd control skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can soak up damage, as well as use powerful AOE skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct has strong Piercing Armor abilities. Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Blue Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: Elite enemy has Super Armor. It cannot be interrupted when Super Armor exists.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Yellow Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct's QTE deals high damage to enemy Super Armor value, eventually inflicting <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Every dodge consumes the dodge gauge, which recovers slowly. You can dodge once in about 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: Consecutively dodging until the dodge gauge is exhausted will result in overheating. Becoming unable to dodge in the next 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: [Dodge] the moment before you are hit to enter [Matrix], in which all enemies are slowed down.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Signal Orb bar is glowing, it means pinging any orbs will have the same effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix through dodging has a 12s cooldown. You cannot enter Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Use [Matrix 3-Ping] to trigger [Lotus Dual Blade] more quickly.

Name: Celica
Text: [Matrix Cooldown] is not shared among the Constructs. Switch Constructs to trap enemies in Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Nanami]

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Lucia]

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami's QTE Skill can destroy enemy's armor, inflicting the <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: There are some tips for pinging the orbs in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are 4 Signal Orbs of the same color, tap the <color=#ffda58>leftmost one</color> to ping only 1 orb and keep the other 3 orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can apply this 1+3 pinging order to instantly trigger a 3-Ping effect twice.

Name: Celica
Text: Support QTE can restore HP or grant buffs.

Name: Celica
Text: When facing an enemy with heavy armor, use Tank-type Construct to enhance the Piercing Armor effect.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's get through here first... I'll explain to you later.

Name: Liv
Text: I can do it. I'll just be careful to not come into contact with these things.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We need your ability to access the M.I.N.D. and enter the central consciousness container.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Defeat those pseudo-consciousnesses and save them all.

Name: Liv
Text: Understood...

Name: Liv
Text: Watanabe? What's... going on?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Your consciousness... has been replaced and trapped in the fake M.I.N.D.? Darn it! Liv, hold on!

Name: Liv
Text: That is... me?

Name: Watanabe
Text: If you're attacked here, your consciousness permanently deviates.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We're creating an exit for you...

Name: Watanabe
Text: OK, use this trap to defeat her and you can get out of there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Liv, what's the situation?

Name: Liv
Text: Seems to have gotten rid of her...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Phew... That's great.

Name: Liv
Text: Don't worry, Watanabe... It's not a big deal.

Name: Liv
Text: That's ... me? Such beautiful clothes...

Name: Watanabe
Text: That thing is not done yet...?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've hacked the system firewall. Liv, get out of there quick.

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I couldn't save all of you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've never seen a machine with such special consciousness...

Name: Lee
Text: Humans have left the Earth too long. We're no longer familiar with what has happened in this world.

Name: Lee
Text: All we can do is keep striving forward on our own path.

Name: Lucia
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, we'll need you to access its control system to ensure it will not attack us when we reboot it.

Name: Liv
Text: Ok, leave it to me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, we're going to collect its scattered Memory Chips. We should be able to access more clues after a reboot.

Name: Old Artist
Text: Anthony, thank you for being my hands to help me complete my artwork... I have no more regrets.

Name: Old Artist
Text: My life is about to end. I don't need to paint anymore.

Name: Anthony
Text: No more... painting...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... am I also... useless?

Name: Old Artist
Text: No, your journey has just begun.

Name: Old Artist
Text: I was controlling you to make my own works, but now, you can create your own by your thoughts.

Name: Anthony
Text: My... thoughts...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... do you... recognize my... works?

Name: Old Artist
Text: To be honest, I don't really understand your works.

Name: Anthony
Text: Because... I am a... machine?

Name: Old Artist
Text: Could be, or could not. In any case, I hope you can keep it up.

Name: Old Artist
Text: You were so happy when making them. There must be someone who can understand you and share your joy in the future.

Name: Old Artist
Text: If you do find someone like that, you must not let them down...

Name: Old Artist
Text: Alright, I need to rest now.

Name: Buyer
Text: Darn it! I was planning on taking a gamble on this "Robot Artist" gimmick.

Name: Buyer
Text: Thanks to the Punishing Virus, everyone is afraid of robots now!

Name: Buyer
Text: Now those paintings are worth nothing! All turned into waste paper!

Name: Buyer
Text: You're worth nothing more than being a tool... I should sell you to other painters who need an assistant.

Name: Buyer
Text: Realizing a human artist's will. That's all you are.

Name: Lucia
Text: The chip is assembled.

Name: Lee
Text: We can reboot it now.

Name: Liv
Text: Um, preparing to access and reproduce Nozzle's memories.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A world without humans... Free world... Free art...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Hehe... hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Why... have to fight...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: There... must be a solution... where battle... is not necessary...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one understands me... No one... appreciates... my work...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is damaged...

Name: Liv
Text: I think I'll have to sync the memory up manually.

Name: Lucia
Text: Here's the first breakpoint. Liv, you can start the rebooting process.

Name: Liv
Text: Will do. Just a reminder the reboot will produce memory illusions.

Name: Liv
Text: Ready to reboot.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll take care of the illusions.

Name: Lee
Text: This is the last breakpoint. Let's get it over and done with.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll do my best.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's Corrupted! They are forming an organization!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We must stop them!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: What... are... you... doing...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... You must not... destroy the Sagemachina's will... Do not... damage... my work...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... you awakened us...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Graffiti... is art... art...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The number of Corrupted keeps growing!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Attack!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Humans... cannot... understand...

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like here's another piece of damaged memory.

Name: Lucia
Text: In order to find more clues, a reboot is necessary.

Name: Lee
Text: Here's the breakpoint.

Name: Lucia
Text: Alright, start the reboot.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, get ready.

Name: Lee
Text: Got it. Same as always.

Name: Liv
Text: Replaying the memory now.

Name: Tifa
Text: Why aren't you stopping them?!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Because... they were... just running...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They didn't... interfere... with my... creation... Hehe...

Name: Tifa
Text: What a foolish machine...

Name: Tifa
Text: But your powers are special. I may consider taking you in. You can become an Ascendant like me.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I cannot... follow you... Hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Only the Sagemachina... can... lead us... to a future of our own...

Name: Tifa
Text: Fool, the future of the world belongs to the Ascension-Network... This is just as expected of a machine.

Name: Tifa
Text: If you are not joining me, then die.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: You... are... as superficial... as those humans...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: So... tired...

Name: Tifa
Text: What an insignificant prey.

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Protect... the leader!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: It's...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... run...

Name: Tifa
Text: I-I'm Tifa! A Support Construct! I'm honored to become a part of Suzaku!

Name: Tifa
Text: I don't think I'm a good fighter...

Name: Tifa
Text: Can I still... fight alongside everyone?

Name: Tifa
Text: Yes! Understood...! Commandant, you're such a gentle and dependable person!

Name: Tifa
Text: What to do...

Name: Tifa
Text: Okay, take a deep breath... Just like what Commandant said...

Name: Tifa
Text: Mission complete! I knew Suzaku was the best!

Name: Tifa
Text: As long as I'm with Commandant, I'm not afraid of any enemy!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant! Watch out!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Why...

Name: Tifa
Text: It's all my fault... I'm too weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Without you, I cannot go on anymore...

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed... Tifa fell in love with her commandant...

Name: Lee
Text: She was hearing her own voice all along...

Name: Roland
Text: Come on, it's time to prove yourselves.

Name: Roland
Text: Kill... Devour... Make the power your own...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Power... The power to become free...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Give... me... the power of Ascendants...

Name: Tifa
Text: Power... is flowing...

Name: Tifa
Text: I... want more... power...

Name: Roland
Text: Should I say you've got good potential?

Name: Roland
Text: But it takes more to become an Ascendant.

Name: Roland
Text: A winner deserves a reward. You have earned yourself a letter of invitation to the next trial.

Name: Roland
Text: A wise choice. I will tell you more things that you want to know...

Name: Roland
Text: Right... The power of Ascnet.

Name: Roland
Text: This is the power of Ascnet. The more Punishing Virus you absorb... the stronger you are...

Name: Tifa
Text: I want more...

Name: Tifa
Text: Roland... Give me... more!

Name: Roland
Text: Hahaha. The first-timers are always so eager.

Name: Roland
Text: I said, you are not the only one special here. You still have one final test.

Name: Roland
Text: Destroy it and prove to me you can walk out here alive, then I will give you more of my power.

Name: Roland
Text: This power enables you to see the dawn with your own eyes. It can also help you...

Name: Roland
Text: To take revenge on the Punishing Virus... On the entire world...

Name: Roland
Text: Unleash yourself, Tifa.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What is that "thing"... I have never seen anything so freakish...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: In just one hit... How... terrifying...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Don't fall back! Destroy it!

Name: Tifa
Text: Destroy...?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What... is it doing?!

Name: Tifa
Text: Insects...

Name: Tifa
Text: This is the power beyond Punishing Virus...

Name: Tifa
Text: Humans are indeed ignorant and weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: If I had this power earlier... I could have saved Commandant...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The Corrupted are coming again!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Don't worry, we have deployed the Iso-Devices! Just stay inside and you'll be right!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Defeat them!

Name: Tifa
Text: Ah... Iso-Device... It reminds me of those days with Commandant again...

Name: Tifa
Text: How naive were we to believe in toys like Iso-Devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Look at all these human toys... Infect them all, Corrupted!

Name: Tifa
Text: Right. Arm yourselves... with all the devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Let the humans... suffer from their own naivety!

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha!

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, this section of Tifa's memory is heavily corrupted by the Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to get rid of these Punishing Virus illusions first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are those people... from Cerberus?

Name: Lee
Text: Doesn't look like it to me.

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you want to know more about the Ascendants?

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha...

Name: Tifa
Text: Perhaps, you should... feel it for yourself...

Name: Kamui
Text: Darn, she's too powerful...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by the Punishing Virus...

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: You are no ordinary Corrupted. What on earth are you...?

Name: Tifa
Text: It's only been a few days. Have I changed so much?

Name: Tifa
Text: Oh well...

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you recognize me now?

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Are you... that lost Construct...? But why...

Name: Roland
Text: Has all the fire been put off? About time to go.

Name: Roland
Text: What a beautiful place. Miss Luna surely has great taste.

Name: Roland
Text: A pity that it will become a battlefield soon.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Identity: Corrupted. Threat Level: 5

Name: Terrapod
Text: Executing battle command—

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? These machines are not infected by Punishing Virus. Interesting...

Name: Roland
Text: What's the name of the machine that Gabriel hates most? Oh, "Sagemachina"... They don't look like his work though.

Name: Roland
Text: Which means this place has an owner.

Name: Roland
Text: I must pay a visit first to the owner then.

Name: Roland
Text: Luckily, I've got a gift prepared...

Name: Roland
Text: These bionic animals... look quite real.

Name: Roland
Text: I have to give credit to the Estate owner's vintage taste.

Name: Roland
Text: I see... Whenever someone gets closer, they will start to move...

Name: Roland
Text: Even the defense... has a vintage design.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello, dear owner? Have you finally noticed me?

Name: Roland
Text: I assume you have a surveillance system... Or whatever...
The estate welcomes no one. Please leave.

Name: Roland
Text: What if I don't?

Name: Roland
Text: Sensory traps?

Name: Roland
Text: Wow...

Name: Roland
Text: Like an old-school special agent movie... How exciting.

Name: Roland
Text: Haha, I just cleared everything.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... maybe my methods were a bit harsh.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? They are following me.

Name: Roland
Text: I didn't expect them to be so quick in reaction.

Name: Roland
Text: You all are too early. The party isn't ready yet...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's an Ascendant! Ascendant Roland!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Oh gosh... Look at his readings... The concentration of Punishing Virus is insane...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: The enemy is powerful. We cannot afford to hesitate even for a split second!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... We are... no match for him...

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm, this should be all of them.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: I must... avenge my teammates... Must... let other teams know...

Name: Roland
Text: ...A sneak attack?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You bloody Corrupted... Deserves no respect!

Name: Roland
Text: How rude!

Name: Roland
Text: As I expect... Humans are despicable beings...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Keep your formation. Eliminate the Ascendant!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh, how conceited can you all be?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... Open fire!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Um... Argh! Why are you removing our Inver-Devices? Are you trying to... infect us?

Name: Roland
Text: Infect? You don't deserve that gift. I am leaving you here.

Name: Roland
Text: See this bomb in my hand? It suits your sad and sorry selves.

Name: Roland
Text: I will plant it in your body. Then...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait, what! What are you doing!?

Name: Roland
Text: When your teammates come and get you... You will become...

Name: Roland
Text: Hideous fireworks.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Argh... Gosh... Why... Why...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Why did I... even fight...

Name: Kamui
Text: Phew... Finally got here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm? Why is there no one around?

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Greetings... You should just stay here forever.

Name: Liv
Text: The normal route leads people to this fake hall...

Name: Liv
Text: To enter the real guest hall, we must take a special route.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I locked up all those Corrupted that the Estate could not destroy inside this room.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: If those people are going to use you, I would rather you get consumed by the Corrupted...

Name: Roland
Text: Did he purposely separate us?

Name: Roland
Text: What a waste of effort. I've already found you.

Name: Kamui
Text: That voice sounds so familiar...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey, butler. Did something happen over there?

Name: Lucia
Text: He's not answering. Let's find a way out first.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will stop you right here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I must protect... Mr. Copperfield's... lifelong work...

Name: Roland
Text: Thanks for all the joy you brought me today, Mr. Butler.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm very sorry... But I must let Punishing Virus infect you.

Name: Roland
Text: It's all for Miss Luna.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will... never yield!

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Ugh... Aaargh!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Zack
Text: Corrupted incoming... Emma... lost... Must... protect... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away...

Name: Zack
Text: Must... find... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I need to scan Zack's memory shell before attempting to repair him.

Name: Liv
Text: The structure of the memory shell is simple, but for some reason, it isn't deeply infected.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's investigate together.

Name: Liv
Text: The tag of the important record is "Operation Grand Retreat".

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing Virus has infested these data zones. The virus illusions are impacting our data query.

Name: Liv
Text: I've made some progress. All related data found. Loading now.

Name: Liv
Text: I just need to repair one more section to start reading Zack's memories.

Name: Zack
Text: Clues of... Emma's lost items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Calculating... Completed... West halls...

Name: Lee
Text: Large-scale data corruption here. Leave it to me.

Name: Lee
Text: At the end of the Post-Pandemic Age, Corrupted controlled by the Punishing Virus already had military production capabilities.

Name: Lee
Text: Even with the comprehensive defense of this Estate Museum, it could not hold against the overwhelming number of Corrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: That was the situation they had to face.

Name: Zack
Text: Zack... help... Emma and Copperfield... retreat...

Name: Liv
Text: We've reached the deepest part of the data. The record shows Zack was already being infected at that time.

Name: Liv
Text: But somehow the infection was restricted and controlled at a certain level.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's clear the virus illusions here and read the final record.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Zack... We are the only ones left here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will take you to the Static Lock. I hope Mr. Copperfield's research will work.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Before that, I just need to calm you down... I never thought we would end up like this.

Name: Liv
Text: Recreating memory now. Hope we can find clues of the Ascendant.

Name: Sister
Text: Punishing Virus injection complete... All weapon system activated... Increasing power output...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, why is she using the power of Punishing Virus, but still seen as an enemy by Corrupted?

Name: Sister
Text: I haven't fought for a long time. Looks like... this will be my last fight.

Name: Sister
Text: Gargh. This power still impacts my mind... In the end, it still tests my faith...

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk. I thought that God bloke abandoned me long ago...

Name: Liv
Text: There are way too many Corrupted. Commandant, we should retreat now!

Name: Sister
Text: I should continue... with my final cleansing...

Name: Liv
Text: Simulation in progress. Commandant, please watch closely!

Name: Liv
Text: Even in this time, her frame capabilities are as good as ours in battle.

Name: Liv
Text: But we have no information at all... I wonder how many secrets did the Church have in the past?

Name: Liv
Text: All those Corrupted came from the machine factory's direction.

Name: Liv
Text: If the source remains, their numbers would only keep growing... Exactly like what happened to us.

Name: Liv
Text: The Sister's destination... seems to be right there.

Name: Sister
Text: Phew, just like those little brats... You always look down on adults.

Name: Sister
Text: Do you know how difficult it is to be an adult...? Get out of my way!

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk.

Name: Liv
Text: The Punishing Virus' impact must have peaked around this point.

Name: Liv
Text: These are... the large firefighting robots we met before...

Name: Lee
Text: Yet, Punishing Virus modified them into arsonists. How ironic.

Name: Liv
Text: Data interfered by virus illusions...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. I'm activating emergency mode.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. We've seen it many times. We know what to do.

Name: Liv
Text: Virus interference removed. Re-syncing now.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, the virus infection is rooted deeply here... It needs a deep cleaning. I'll need help.

Name: Liv
Text: She managed to... hold off so many Corrupted here...

Name: Liv
Text: As if she had an endless reserve of energy... Was it because of the Punishing Virus, or her own obsession?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, it's a new combat objective!

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of broken memory probably came from when Sister was hunted by Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to manually repair the noise while tracing the memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Recording complete. So this is when Sister met Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: Next section... Okay, done.

Name: Liv
Text: After ascension, even Nozzle could use tactics against its enemy.

Name: Liv
Text: The final section is also recorded.

Name: Liv
Text: There were just too many Corrupted. Even Sister had no choice but to run.

Name: Sister
Text: This is the factory's core...

Name: Sister
Text: Why would humans design such a fragile structure... Once it's destroyed, everything will be lost. How unreliable.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data shows that Sister had already reached her infection limit.

Name: Liv
Text: But she hadn't completed her objective yet...

Name: Liv
Text: Let's finish this journey with her.

Name: Liv
Text: All missions in the current stage have been completed. Go to the memory breakpoint to start the next stage.

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of memory is already close to the end.

Name: Liv
Text: ...This should be Sister's final struggle.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's go get her final memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data videos show that Rohacchi found some spark falling into the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: And it became very interested in it.

Name: Liv
Text: It then traced all the way toward the spark's landing point.

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed to have also activated some mechanism within the ruins...

Name: Liv
Text: To further analyze the videos in this memory data...

Name: Liv
Text: I will recreate the situation by video.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is completely restored. Rohacchi opened this switch to move to a higher level.

Name: Liv
Text: The sealed road opened again.

Name: Liv
Text: On Rohacchi's journey, it bumped into the source of the spark and noises... It was attacked by "Roseblade".

Name: Liv
Text: As expected, all the suddenly appeared Constructs were related to Ascendants. They were also after "Tenebrion".

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I suggest we carefully study the combat data against "Roseblade". It will benefit our subsequent operations.

Name: Liv
Text: Rohacchi seemed to have met similar-looking machines.

Name: Liv
Text: It thought they were its own kind and went up to them.

Name: Liv
Text: Only to be met with sudden assault.

Name: Liv
Text: Subsequent memory data has been deciphered. Transforming to digital video now.

Name: Liv
Text: In the memory, IX-68 squatted next to one of its "kin," slowly patting its body...

Name: Liv
Text: Here, Rohacchi met Nanami...

Name: Liv
Text: And suddenly attacked...!?

Name: Liv
Text: Perhaps we could find more information about Nanami from this memory.

Name: Liv
