Text: The battle didn't last long, and Nanami seemed to have moved together with Rohacchi for some time.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the memory, Rohacchi and Nanami defeated many Corrupted and returned to the upper level of the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like the "mural" they were talking about must be nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll continue with my analysis, Commandant. Please look out for any info related to the "mural" that caused them to awaken.

Name: Liv
Text: According to Rohacchi's memory, this should be where they first saw the mural.

Name: Liv
Text: But when it took Nanami there, they found nothing.

Name: Liv
Text: Apart from those machines wandering nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe the ruins collapsed because of us, so the murals also fell to another location.

Name: Liv
Text: No matter what, this piece of memory is worth studying again.

Name: Kamui
Text: I found well-preserved facilities underneath the ruins.

Name: Kamui
Text: I tried my best to stay awake.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I knew I didn't have much time left.

Name: Kamui
Text: So I had to break away from the Corrupted ASAP.

Name: Kamui
Text: One after another. Aren't you all tired??

Name: Kamui
Text: Why don't you just come all together? At least it can save some time.

Name: Kamui
Text: I must keep moving. No one can stop me.

Name: Kamui
Text: At the bottom of the ruins, I found a long and narrow corridor. Unlike the upper levels, the facilities there were kept very well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I was exhausted from non-stop fighting.

Name: Kamui
Text: Those Corrupted seemed to have noticed this too, and launched an assault together.

Name: Kamui
Text: Tsk, the number just keeps growing...

Name: Camu
Text: Looks like you need my help.

Name: Kamui
Text: I know what you're planning. I'm not done yet!

Name: Camu
Text: Hah, you bluff. I know full well about your body.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...I will never let the virus infect me.

Name: Karenina
Text: You, stop right there!

Name: Kamui
Text: I was shocked to hear such a loud voice. Never thought she would catch up so quickly.

Name: Kamui
Text: And thanks to her, all the wandering Corrupted came up to us. The only thought I had was to never let them get me.

Name: Kamui
Text: After getting rid of all the annoying Corrupted, Camu launched his final attack too.

Name: Kamui
Text: He was far more powerful than me. I knew about that. All too well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I had my reasons to fight too...

Name: Kamui
Text: Of course I would not fall so easily! Because I must be myself!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... You are finally here...

Name: Sister
Text: Take me along, and cleanse this planet!

Name: Camu
Text: Am I Kamui or not? That doesn't matter.

Name: Archer
Text: Your arrow is my arrow!

Name: Tyrant
Text: Find… Emma…

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Welcome... my audience...

Name: Roland
Text: You want to be an Ascendant? Ha, you are not qualified!

Name: System
Text: Initiating Punishing relay communication—

Name: Roland
Text: Hello? Can anyone hear me...? Tsk, I just don't understand how this thing works.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello...?

Name: α
Text: Speak.

Name: Roland
Text: So you've been listening... Fine. Can't you be a bit more passionate to your comrades?

Name: α
Text: If you don't have anything important, I'll hang up. I'm very busy.

Name: Roland
Text: Miss Luna sent me to ask... Well, it's not really about "us"...

Name: Roland
Text: I mean, you are crossing the Bering Strait now.

Name: α
Text: Oh really.

Name: Roland
Text: Don't you know? We noticed that your coordinates were moving through the Pacific Ocean over the last week...

Name: Roland
Text: So what's going on with you?

Name: α
Text: I'm on the back of a Narwhal.

Name: Roland
Text: Um, what...?

Name: α
Text: I've already controlled its diving module. Maybe three more days...

Name: Roland
Text: Three days then what?

Name: α
Text: It will be tamed and become my pet.

Name: Roland
Text: I remember... You started from the coastal areas of South America. Did you find it over there?

Name: α
Text: Yes.

Name: Roland
Text: You really are into weird things like this, aren't you...

Name: α
Text: It probably has a consciousness that is highly identical to a human's. I find it very interesting.

Name: α
Text: The fact that it was attacked by the Corrupted proves this.

Name: α
Text: And...

Name: Roland
Text: Yes?

Name: α
Text: The view was great there.

Name: α
Text: I'm going to focus on dealing with the Corrupted. They are interfering with my control over the Narwhal.

Name: α
Text: Meanwhile... Help me look for more information about it.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm not your bellboy, but... whatever.

Name: α
Text: The communication signal is lost... I must prevent the virus infection and restore the communication...

Name: α
Text: This horn has similar functions to a Construct's Inver-Device...

Name: α
Text: So it must be communicating with some Construct... Interesting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv... What's wrong with them?

Name: Liv
Text: Defense terminal stopped running, causing the loss of many defense commands...

Name: Liv
Text: Without commands, they can't do anything.

Name: Lucia
Text: So the defense mechanism's stopped working. Aren't the humans here going to do something about it?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we've done it! All defense machines are back in order.

Name: Liv
Text: Remember, the defense machines are armed with powerful weapons, but they have poor armor.

Name: Lee
Text: Those civilians are watching us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't be distracted. Stick to the plan and protect the defense machines.

Name: α
Text: Very strong will... Good...

Name: α
Text: You are worthy to face my blade.

Name: α
Text: So there's no more need to talk.

Name: α
Text: Show me what you have.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, Lee, sorry. Can I leave this to you?

Name: Lucia
Text: I want to go in directly.

Name: Lucia
Text: That white-haired Ascendant is there... I can't miss the opportunity.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood. We will try our best to hold her up for you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll be back ASAP...!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...You aren't going through.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave her alone. We'll be your opponent!

Name: Liv
Text: No... We can't stop her... She's too powerful...!

Name: Lee
Text: Wait...! What are those... in the sea?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: In the sea...? A raging tide?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Derek!

Name: Diana
Text: Gray Raven, thanks for your help...

Name: Diana
Text: Please, hold against the Corrupted!

Name: Diana
Text: Everybody, defend the port!

Name: Diana
Text: Nascal!

Name: Lee
Text: The Forest Guards are suffering casualties!

Name: Lucia
Text: Our battle isn't over!

Name: α
Text: If you call that a battle.

Name: α
Text: You are not even half as good as her.

Name: α
Text: Do you even understand what you have done...?

Name: Lucia
Text: You are my enemy, and I'm going to defeat you. This will never change!

Name: α
Text: ...You never learn.

Name: α
Text: I made her an Ascendant in order to save her.

Name: α
Text: But because of what you did...

Name: α
Text: She will become a mindless puppet controlled by the Punishing Virus instead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...!

Name: Lucia
Text: But so what...? Both the Corrupted and the so-called Ascendants are the enemy of humans.

Name: α
Text: Is that so... Whatever.

Name: α
Text: Just stay there and watch. This is the difference between us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Why am I... drawn to her...

Name: α
Text: Hmph. Even as a puppet...

Name: α
Text: You still know who's the strong one...

Name: α
Text: Let's end it then.

Name: Diana
Text: It's been a while since I last came here.

Name: Lucia
Text: What is this place, Diana...?

Name: Diana
Text: During the early outbreak of the Punishing Virus, Murmansk was once very prosperous due to its geographical advantages.

Name: Diana
Text: It absorbed many inland cities and formed a commonwealth. This place was part of the northeast commonwealth.

Name: Diana
Text: And one of the birthplaces of Forest Guard.

Name: Lee
Text: There's no time for nostalgia... We are followed.

Name: Diana
Text: Smells like a prey...

Name: Lucia
Text: Forest Guards, continue tracing forward. Stay close to the target...

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Raven will bring up the rear and deal with the enemies in the shadows!

Name: Lee
Text: The target is not far ahead, but why didn't you ask the Forest Guard to follow up?

Name: Diana
Text: You said Evan was on his feet. There's no way he could lose the Corrupted.

Name: Diana
Text: But we didn't see him when we locked on to the target...

Name: Diana
Text: Something's not right.

Name: Liv
Text: Our target is running away!

Name: Lucia
Text: Hesitation will only lead to failure. Go! Stop it!

Name: Diana
Text: Evan can't just disappear!

Name: Diana
Text: There must be other clues nearby. Forest Guards! Spread out!

Name: Diana
Text: Search everywhere! Everywhere!

Name: Diana
Text: Someone found a 5cm long, shattered titanium plate...

Name: Liv
Text: Please let me take a look!

Name: Liv
Text: ...Yes! There's human sebum and hair on the edges.

Name: Diana
Text: That's our first clue! We are on the right track!

Name: Lee
Text: Looking for clues help, but the longer we stay here, the easier we may become the target instead...

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, are you talking about the wandering Corrupted in the forest?

Name: Lee
Text: Not just the forest. They could also be among the snowy rocks, even river beds.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant! Please stay alerted!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm about to process the human pheromones found on these parts...

Name: Liv
Text: Diana, please give me Evan's weapon. I need to collect his pheromones.

Name: Liv
Text: The two samples matched perfectly! Evan was here! Now I can make a pheromone detector.

Name: Diana
Text: Is that...?

Name: Lee
Text: As long as Evan is still breathing, we can detect the pheromone he produces.

Name: Liv
Text: Found him!!

Name: Liv
Text: He's trapped on the shell of the Corrupted. Why...? Are they using him to protect themselves?

Name: Lucia
Text: Adjust your equipment immediately! Only melee weapons are allowed. We must not hurt humans!

Name: Lee
Text: I can't cut through these metal bones without hurting the rescue target.

Name: Lee
Text: Our only option is to make a strategic relocation. Take it back to the Forest Guard stronghold first, then we can think of another way.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee... How's his health doing?

Name: Lee
Text: Don't worry, he's not infected. Just a little hypothermia.

Name: Liv
Text: Strong Punishing reaction detected nearby! Everyone, watch out!

Name: Diana
Text: The Corrupted are still killing.

Name: Lucia
Text: Diana, please join us and form a line of defense together.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must not let Corrupted hurt humans.

Name: Diana
Text: The Forest Guard acknowledges Liv's strategic vision.

Name: Diana
Text: My sisters and I will do all we can to assist Gray Raven's rescue plan.

Name: Lee
Text: Calculations complete. The enemy's weak points are its supporting legs.

Name: Diana
Text: Sisters! Focus fire on the supporting legs!

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. Mr. Lee didn't include Evan in his calculation...

Name: Liv
Text: Some of those legs are very close to Evan's location.

Name: Liv
Text: Please, everyone, don't hurt Evan.

Name: Liv
Text: That cross-shaped terminal is causing EM polarization on the other devices.

Name: Liv
Text: The affected devices are nigh-immune to most of our attacks.

Name: Liv
Text: Attack the cross-shaped terminal continuously to remove this status from them.

Name: Lee
Text: The light beams radiating from the Heteromer Terminal will repair the Heteromer devices.

Name: Lee
Text: But be careful, these beams contain viruses that will cause stress to our sensory systems if we get hit directly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Commandant of Gray Raven, these oddly shaped terminals have the ability to split apart.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The polar electric current circulating between them can paralyze a Construct's sensory and reduce its mobility.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But consecutive attacks can reverse their polarity.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Consider this option if they appear in this form.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the map, we've managed to land at the designated location—

Name: Liv
Text: The data analysis cabin on the space station.

Name: Liv
Text: But... nothing's left of our aircraft...

Name: Lucia
Text: If we can destroy the space station's defense system, then we should be able to retreat when the main forces arrive.

Name: Lee
Text: These terminals give me the creeps...

Name: Lee
Text: Is this what the report was talking about? The strange corruption phenomenon localized only in this space station?

Name: Lucia
Text: Be careful, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: This is...!

Name: Lee
Text: We managed to unlock a higher clearance level...

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait, that cross just now is guarding the exit now...

Name: Liv
Text: According to my preliminary scanning results, this type of enemy is not made of any known conventional machinery...

Name: Liv
Text: It is... composed entirely of the Punishing Virus...

Name: Lee
Text: This space station really IS hiding some important secrets...

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like we can't just simply blow this place up.

Name: Liv
Text: Guys, I've turned off the space station's sensor systems.

Name: Lee
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Lee
Text: This should help relieve some pressure for Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, our first step to victory.

Name: Liv
Text: We have arrived at the second target location.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the analysis, this should be the weapons control backend...

Name: Liv
Text: ...after being corrupted and modified by the virus.

Name: Lee
Text: A lot of inactive Heteromers in here...

Name: Lucia
Text: If they all turn hostile like what happened just now...

Name: Lee
Text: Do you see that cross-shaped enemy in the middle?

Name: Lee
Text: We're unsure how it manages to...

Name: Lee
Text: ...But it seems like this type of enemy can create enemies, and not to mention that it—

Name: Lucia
Text: Holds the key to solving our problems, I know...

Name: Liv
Text: Those black pillars... decompose... and reconstruct...

Name: Liv
Text: Every bit of Hetero-matter of the Punishing Virus in this space station could become our enemy...

Name: Lee
Text: Our attacks can deactivate them, at least temporarily.

Name: Lee
Text: As long as it works, right?

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, let's deal with them like this for now.

Name: Lee
Text: Finally...

Name: Liv
Text: Ah... Some Hetero-matter have regenerated and are moving again!

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, we're not really in a position to play attrition warfare here...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, access the control system directly. Lee—

Name: Lee
Text: Got it.

Name: Liv
Text: Done!

Name: Liv
Text: All close-range defense systems for interception purposes are offline!

Name: Lucia
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: The subsequent forces have begun issuing boarding signals.

Name: Liv
Text: We won't have to fight on our own anymore.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But, you do look like you're in some sort of trouble.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's skip the small talk.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Consider this my little present.

Name: Liv
Text: The enemies just now displayed a completely different mode of attack.

Name: Liv
Text: But Watanabe's already figured out how to deal with them...

Name: Lucia
Text: Such strength...

Name: Lucia
Text: He feels like a different person.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So, is everything fine?

Name: Lee
Text: Oh, it's all thanks to you, Mr. Watanabe.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hah, spunky as ever.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...This place looks different from the others.

Name: Liv
Text: The door is encrypted. Your specialty, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: (Analyzing...)

Name: Lee
Text: I... see...

Name: Lee
Text: There's four corrupted terminals in the four corners of this compartment.

Name: Lee
Text: Varied combinations can be produced by activating them...

Name: Lee
Text: Let's try different combinations.

Name: Lee
Text: Door's cracked, but the Heteromers have entered defense mode...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Well, progress. At least.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's finish off the remaining enemies.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Levels, huh? The mysterious blocks on the terminal might be the key.

Name: Liv
Text: It appears that interacting with the terminal can change the shape of the block...

Name: Lucia
Text: Looks like we have to choose a shape...

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe something will happen if we leave a certain number of blocks in the corresponding shapes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Lucia... She's all pumped up all of a sudden...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I see. It's a challenge, isn't it? Hah...

Name: Watanabe
Text: All right, I'll accept it—Let's see who can sweep the enemies faster.

Name: Watanabe
Text: How's that? Still got it in me, eh?

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Impressive.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's work together to protect Liv from the last wave of attacks.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Is this what I'm looking for...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What did you say, Watanabe?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Nothing.

Name: Korolev
Text: You... did not comply with... the regulations...

Name: Korolev
Text: Now... Children... Please kindly follow Korolev to the confinement cabin...

Name: Korolev
Text: Accept your punishment...

Name: Korolev
Text: If any resistance occurs... Korolev will follow the rules... to adopt the minimum enforcement measures...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, that... is...?

Name: Liv
Text: It's not composed of Hetero-matter. It's a real Corrupted... I'm afraid...

Name: Lee
Text: It's that Kamui incarnate that's been broadcasting the whole time?

Name: Liv
Text: But, in such a high viral density environment... Can a machine truly maintain its original mind?

Name: Liv
Text: It feels like... it's being held in captivity alone in here... What could be the reason for that...?

Name: Lee
Text: We might never find the answers... All I know now is that we only have one option...

Name: Korolev
Text: Confinement...

Name: Liv
Text: Gravity is starting to act up around here...

Name: Lee
Text: The core of the space station... The gravity room. We finally made it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's the gravity experiment here that gave birth to Hetero-matter—

Name: Watanabe
Text: Who would have thought—Humans aren't just suffering from the Punishing Virus, they even gave it new life...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watanabe... Thank you for fighting with us all this way...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Don't worry, I won't leave until the threat of this space station is resolved.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I know those enemies were just warm-up for you.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Now, let's show them what we can do.

Name: Liv
Text: Those crosses... again...

Name: Liv
Text: It's like their presence is conveying a certain message...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we can't go any further...

Name: Lee
Text: This is an artificially designed area. Now that we've dispatched the enemies—

Name: Lee
Text: The mechanism should be returning to normal.

Name: Lee
Text: Try to get closer to the edge.

Name: Liv
Text: What a stunning design...

Name: Liv
Text: This can only be achieved by precise gravity manipulation...

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I recall, there's gravity generators inside Babylonia as well, no?

Name: Liv
Text: Yes... But I never thought I would come so close to its prototype...

Name: Lucia
Text: I've just tested its integrity. It should be good to go—

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's advance!

Name: Liv
Text: This is...

Name: Lee
Text: Some kind of mechanism again... Guess we can't skip past it.

Name: Lee
Text: Ah, it's a device used to lock those rings.

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like it's used to stabilize the rings and gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Those rings should function in a similar way. Let's go.

Name: Lee
Text: Yeah...

Name: Ayla
Text: I'm not sure what would happen if you mess up...

Name: Ayla
Text: But please follow my instructions.

Name: Ayla
Text: The first message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: From two to one.

Name: Ayla
Text: Do you have any ideas?

Name: Lee
Text: It seems to be related to these light beams...

Name: Lee
Text: I'll try to brute-force it, but it's going to take some time.

Name: Lee
Text: And it might trigger high alert. Anyway, let's get through this together, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: It worked.

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla, please provide the next instruction!

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, the next message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: From abstract to concrete.

Name: Liv
Text: Abstract and concrete... We've encountered enemies like that before.

Name: Liv
Text: Which means... "Starting from the abstract"?

Name: Liv
Text: Let's do it then!

Name: Liv
Text: We can move on now!

Name: Liv
Text: The path is blocked off again.

Name: Ayla
Text: As you can see... There's three movable mechanisms...

Name: Liv
Text: We do!

Name: Ayla
Text: According to the record, the tip here is—

Name: Ayla
Text: The beginning is the end.

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm, I think I kind of get it...

Name: Lee
Text: Same as before, I'll try to crack it forcibly.

Name: Lee
Text: As expected, you solved the puzzle first, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, here we're again...

Name: Ayla
Text: It should be the last mechanism for this ring.

Name: Lucia
Text: Please tell us the last tip.

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, listen carefully—

Name: Ayla
Text: Disarray is unity.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is even more cryptic...

Name: Lucia
Text: But experience tells us that we have to create a certain pattern using these light beams.

Name: Lucia
Text: Although I'm not quite certain about it, I think we might want to create as many divisions and chaos as we can with the beams.

Name: Lee
Text: Backend hacking is also in progress.

Name: Lucia
Text: I think... We got it?

Name: Liv
Text: Yep, well done!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The control mechanism for the next ring has appeared.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's continue.

Name: Lee
Text: Only a few rings left.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah, we'd better hurry. Other troops should be on their way now.

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter what enemy awaits...

Name: Lucia
Text: This time, we have countless teammates on our side.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hmm... maybe it's implying that we have to create a certain pattern.

Name: Liv
Text: Two into... Maybe it's something about the number of light beams.

Name: Watanabe
Text: One might mean a circle, but what does it have to do with the tip?

Name: Lee
Text: Two paths, a single line. I feel like we're nearing the answer.

Name: Liv
Text: Is it meant to be taken literally...?

Name: Lee
Text: If the lines that are crossed becomes connected instead... I guess?

Name: Watanabe
Text: A ring structure...? Could it be a clue to solving this puzzle?

Name: Lucia
Text: Having the beams circulate should match the tip...

Name: Lee
Text: Connecting it in another way might be worth a try...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Maybe we should make the straight lines at the beginning into something else?

Name: Lucia
Text: Light beams... Prism... Three points... Perhaps we can indeed change something...

Name: Liv
Text: Make the single... No, the two merged light beams split. Perhaps... Maybe...

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I will hack into it from the backend now.

Name: Liv
Text: The enemies here look different...

Name: Liv
Text: They didn't decomposed upon being defeated. Instead—

Name: Liv
Text: They entered into a state similar to hibernation... Their energy flow is stable inside their remains...

Name: Lee
Text: No more paths forming ahead. Might be because of these enemies.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I don't know what you make of it, but we'd better act with caution.

Name: Lee
Text: After all, this is a new variant from the ones we've been dealing with.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait... Are they... gathering around us?

Name: Liv
Text: They aren't displaying aggression somehow...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Nonsense.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Unless...

Name: Liv
Text: What's on your mind, Watanabe?

Name: Lee
Text: I'll speak for him—Unless the virus chooses to.

Name: Lucia
Text: The virus chooses to? You mean the Punishing Virus is able to make a choice?

Name: Lucia
Text: That's a sign of intelligence, but...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I don't know... I'm afraid no one knows why, frankly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Well... It's not like we have many options now.

Name: Liv
Text: A path is made... The energy inside these enemies are transferred to the mechanism...

Name: Liv
Text: And also flowing towards the gravity core.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Sounds just like a recipe for disaster.

Name: Lucia
Text: That core is the primary target of this operation.

Name: Lucia
Text: At the very least... We're getting closer to our final target.

Name: Liv
Text: No more new enemies, Lucia.

Name: Lee
Text: Then, this should be the final mechanism.

Name: Lee
Text: After passing through here, we'll be facing the largest Heteromer that is mooching off on the gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hesitation will only lead to our defeat at this point.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Gray Raven, prepare for battle!

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee truly never misses a shot!

Name: Lee
Text: I won't waste a single bullet.

Name: Lee
Text: Mission complete. Prepare to retreat. Commandant should be waiting for us outside here.

Name: Construct A
Text: Mr. Lee, it seems we've been going round in circles...

Name: Lee
Text: This way.

Name: Construct B
Text: Hey, I heard Mr. Lee has no sense of direction. It isn't true, is it? (Softly)

Name: Lee
Text: Remaining Heteromers discovered ahead. Everyone, ready to engage.

Name: Constructs
Text: Roger!

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, we've arrived at the designated location. Nearby devices show apparent traces of being tampered by Gabriel.

Name: Lee
Text: All devices are expected to be recovered in five minutes.

Name: Lee
Text: After this, Engineering Force can "touch down" on the space station and carry out their duties...

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee! Nearby devices have returned to operation all of a sudden!

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, what a tedious parting gift.

Name: Rat
Text: Squeak—! Rat's got some goodies for you! A new life for you!

Name: Rat
Text: Squeak—! Rat's got some goodies for you—! A new life for you—!

Name: Rat
Text: Wait a sec! Why are they beating up my bro?

Name: Rat
Text: Whatever...! The goodies are delivered, squeak—!

Name: Liv
Text: High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! The Corrupted are swarming in—

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm here to help. Please continue the rescue and evacuation.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll do my best!

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll handle the Corrupted on the other side with Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood.

Name: Liv
Text: All people have been evacuated, and some of the wounded have received emergency treatment.

Name: Sophia
Text: Thank you...

Name: Liv
Text: Be careful. Those two Corrupted's energy reactions are abnormal.

Name: Lee
Text: Stay alert. They might be hiding nearby.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll take care of them. You take the opportunity to break through the passage.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay, then we'll destroy the Corrupted lurking there.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia.

Name: Sophia
Text: Got it...

Name: Sophia
Text: The battle is over.

Name: Lucia
Text: The passage is clear!

Name: Liv
Text: It's clear, Sophia!

Name: Sophia
Text: Understood. I'm coming now.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia!

Name: Lee
Text: The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out for their special attacks.

Name: Sophia
Text: It's all cleared.

Name: Sophia
Text: Let's meet up with them now. Changyu's there too.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's shell is hard to break. Liv, can you identify its weaknesses?

Name: Liv
Text: I'm trying!

Name: Lee
Text: We can't go on like this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Gray Raven is fighting the Core's Heteromers.

Name: Sophia
Text: Fend off the Corrupted. Ensure they won't bring any trouble to us.

Name: Changyu
Text: ...I'll take care of the ones behind us.

Name: Sophia
Text: If you push yourself too far, I'll stop you no matter what.

Name: Changyu
Text: Don't sweat it. I have a plan.

Name: Sophia
Text: All cleared. Changyu, what's the situation on your end?

Name: Sophia
Text: Changyu?

Name: Changyu
Text: Sorry... I've dragged you down...

Name: Sophia
Text: Then save your breath. I have to deal with your wounds first.

Name: Changyu
Text: ...Roger that.

Name: Sophia
Text: This way leads back to the carriage.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll be back right away.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll help you collect the parts.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia...

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll be careful...

Name: Liv
Text: That's enough.

Name: Sophia
Text: Half of the Corrupted have been destroyed. This area is safe for now.

Name: Liv
Text: High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! It's...

Name: Lee
Text: A hideous appearance indeed.

Name: Celica
Text: Can you hear me, Gray Ravens? I've detected that you've successfully landed on the train.

Name: Lee
Text: ...And we are now facing the target.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, what do you mean?

Name: Lee
Text: The Hetero-Core has been highly corrupted and mutated when falling to Earth. The target we've been after is right before us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Permission for engagement, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: The Heterozygote's claws seem super dangerous.

Name: Lucia
Text: Perhaps we can entice it to attack us, then we have a chance to destroy its claws.

Name: Liv
Text: It's not working. Our attacks hardly deal any damage to it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, it isn't finished yet.

Name: Liv
Text: This train is...?

Name: Lee
Text: Focus. The enemies aren't finished yet.

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing concentration continues to surge... It's corrupting the new train!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, bring sufficient serum. We'll go after it.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, you're not here to make the deal, are you?

Name: Lee
Text: What are you talking about?

Name: Changyu
Text: If it stops here, Lord Jamilah's plan will be disrupted. It's time to act, Sophia!

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Understood. Then push it to the front.

Name: Lee
Text: Who are these...?

Name: Lee
Text: The sandstorm has disrupted our visual system and the number of Corrupted is increasing. They will hinder our pursuit.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I propose that we adjust the operation, passing through inside the train to intercept our target.

Name: Liv
Text: Glass cupola...

Name: Lee
Text: Perhaps we can go inside the train through the cupola.

Name: Lucia
Text: At this rate, the train will enter the area ravaged by sandstorm... We'll be forced to abandon the pursuit.

Name: Lucia
Text: But if we don't deal with it right now, this train will be the next victim...

Name: Liv
Text: Those mechanoids are... attacking each other?

Name: Lee
Text: The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.

Name: Lee
Text: ...It seems that the uncorrupted mechanoids are defending against the corrupted ones.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll help.

Name: Lee
Text: You're here too, Sophia.

Name: Sophia
Text: In order to evacuate the people, we have to intercept the Heterozygote formed by core mutation.

Name: Liv
Text: This way!

Name: Commoner
Text: That is the aristocrats' carriage. If we enter without permission...

Name: Sophia
Text: Commoners and aristocrats, aren't we humans at the end of the day? Come this way if you want to live!

Name: Commoner
Text: Okay, I got it!

Name: Lee
Text: We're safe now.

Name: Liv
Text: That's great...

Name: Lucia
Text: We'd better leave once we've planned our next step.

Name: System
Text: (Akdilek Record)

Name: System
Text: This train is refitted with the Central Purification Filter designs of the City Series of 020, 030, and 050.

Name: System
Text: But the truth is, the filter is not capable of supporting the whole train.

Name: System
Text: Therefore, after the completion of all works, all carriages will be classified and, superior races will be separated from the inferior ones.

Name: System
Text: Like Babylonia, we will keep hope alive.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sophia, enemy signals come from there!

Name: Sophia
Text: There's a ladder ahead on the train roof.

Name: Lee
Text: If we'd been allowed to do our work earlier, none of this would've happened.

Name: Lee
Text: Message from the command center... Reinforcements?

Name: Liv
Text: Move now, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, something falling down!

Name: Sophia
Text: No more obstacles. I have to reach Changyu quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it... a letter?

Name: Construct
Text: My name... It no longer matters. I thought I could have gotten through this train and completed the mission.

Name: Construct
Text: But in the end, I was still a fool. I was classified as a pariah, a slave.

Name: Construct
Text: If we don't act... The Ascendants will...

Name: Construct
Text: I'm already drained... So...!

Name: Construct
Text: Please be careful of... a thing called "Lullaby".

Name: Lee
Text: The kid from Akdilek... seems to be severely wounded.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Bring it on!

Name: Lucia
Text: We're able to close in on the enemies at this rate.

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, Lucia, Lee. The Heterozygote's reaction...

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh!

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia! Lee!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, Lucia and Lee have fallen off the train!

Name: Liv
Text: If we get off the train now, those people might...

Name: Liv
Text: The radar doesn't lose Lucia and Lee's signals...

Name: Liv
Text: At this rate... Let's go back to the carriage first and wait for Lucia and Lee, Commandant.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh—!

Name: Bianca
Text: My presence has been exposed...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's been a long time since I used this frame.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hope I can still handle it.

Name: Bianca
Text: The gate operating system has been damaged a bit.

Name: Bianca
Text: We can find the parts from the nearby remains to repair it...

Name: Bianca
Text: Only uncorrupted parts can be used to fix the gate.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are many Corrupted nearby. Any mistakes will alert them. Be careful.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Still works.

Name: Bianca
Text: Everything seems to have remained the same.

Name: Bianca
Text: Then, I only have to wait on the second floor.

Name: Bianca
Text: Finally, the upper floor... Should be able to see the train soon.

Name: Bianca
Text: We need to move fast.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's Gronin Station notice...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...This station will cease operations once the construction of Gestalt's new circuit network is completed.

Name: Bianca
Text: All gates will be closed from today onwards, and the staff will be transported out of this place once their IDs are deleted.

Name: Bianca
Text: But those track maintenance machines, whether they are personal property or not, are not allowed to be taken away from this station.

Name: Bianca
Text: Afterward, (an unclear name) will take over the station.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is the Gestalt Order No. 202 approved by the World Government. Please keep calm and follow the order.

Name: Bianca
Text: The train will pass through here soon enough.

Name: Bianca
Text: But the gate has blocked the passage. We have to close it again as soon as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are many Corrupted lurking around.

Name: Bianca
Text: We can't go forward if we don't deal with this.

Name: Bianca
Text: All cleared. And the next is...

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca... Why are you here?

Name: Bianca
Text: Lucia? and that motorcycle...

Name: Lucia
Text: I found it ahead. I'm ready to go after it now.

Name: Bianca
Text: What's wrong?

Name: Lucia
Text: You're not going?

Name: Bianca
Text: (Sighs)

Name: Lucia
Text: Full speed ahead!

Name: Bianca
Text: Wait, slow down!

Name: Lucia
Text: The train runs too fast, but I can't lag behind anymore. Commandant needs me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca, please shoot down the enemies in our way, otherwise we won't be able to approach the train.

Name: Bianca
Text: Target confirmed in the Hawkeye sight distance.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's good enough, Bianca. Let's jump on the train!

Name: Liv
Text: It's still moving forward. The train will stop running if the engine is corrupted, and the people will...

Name: Lucia
Text: The filter will go down if the train stops...

Name: Lee
Text: Which means arriving at the terminal earlier than expected?

Name: Sophia
Text: This isn't the train's terminal... Our train won't stop there!

Name: Liv
Text: This is—Watch out!

Name: Liv
Text: It's just like in the space station. A faint energy activity still remains within that burnt frame!

Name: Lucia
Text: Same move again? But this time...

Name: Chrome
Text: The visual designs match with the style of "Kowloong". Could it be...

Name: Kamui
Text: That's our guy! Hey, stop running!

Name: Chrome
Text: Don't be reckless, Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader!

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll take the lead. Watch my back!

Name: Chrome
Text: ...Tsk.

Name: Chrome
Text: It shouldn't have much energy left. Should still be nearby.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Corrupted are attracted by the commotion of combat...

Name: Chrome
Text: They even have more helpers...

Name: Chrome
Text: Were they already hidden nearby under camouflage?

Name: Chrome
Text: Gotcha!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader, are you alright?!

Name: Chrome
Text: It ran away.

Name: Kamui
Text: Ran away?

Name: Chrome
Text: Don't worry. I've got its info recorded.

Name: Chrome
Text: No matter where it goes, we'll be able to track it.

Name: Commandant
Text: A connection is made to a virtual M.I.N.D. of one of the guards outside.

Name: Commandant
Text: The virtual M.I.N.D. of mechanoid is more akin to a simulation of reality.

Name: Commandant
Text: Perhaps the passcode to the cabin door can be found in its memory data.

Name: Ballwheel IV
Text: Thinking circuits... Abnormal...

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 004
Text: Area under attack... Intruders are... From... Side E...

Name: Commandant
Text: Lucia, Liv, Lee. Wait for me.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 001
Text: Type IV... Rolling out. Type I, disobeyed orders, dismantled.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 002
Text: Cutting, isn't, performing. Want, voice, device. Want, singing.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 003
Text: Protect, the, goods. Why, not, a, performance mission?

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: The traps have an attack interval. Maybe you can find an opportunity to go through.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: The virtual M.I.N.D. is still part of the M.I.N.D., so there may be some overflowing data.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: Once attacked, you'll need some time to regenerate.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: If you find a trap impossible to pass, try destroying it with attacks.

Name: Lee
Text: So this place isn't unguarded after all. Look at those performer-bots...

Name: Lucia
Text: They're coming for us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Seems like they don't want to disturb the people in the night market.

Name: Lee
Text: They may have been ordered to ensure the market is running normally.

Name: Lee
Text: They want to direct us away from the market. Great, exactly what we want.

Name: Liv
Text: No infection detected. They're just normal mechanoids...

Name: Commandant
Text: Don't damage their core modules. Do it cleanly, then we get off the ship.

Name: Lee
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please give your orders.

Name: All
Text: (Cheering)

Name: Lee
Text: The people thought we were putting on a show...

Name: Lucia
Text: Now that Commandant is back, let's get off the ship first.

Name: Lee
Text: ...They found us already. How fast.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's run.

Name: Lee
Text: Now they're waiting ahead of us?

Name: Lucia
Text: We don't have time. We'll have to force through them...
At least let me finish!
Stop these people.

Name: Hanged Man
Text: —Item 01, please come on stage.

Name: Cheering
Text: YEEEAAAAHH—!

Name: Cheering
Text: Marvelous! This is so beautiful!

Name: Booing
Text: What a poser!

Name: Hanged Man
Text: O—Gorgeous lady—

Name: Hanged Man
Text: —Go to the surrounding stages—If you wish to win—

Name: Hanged Man
Text: Show us your strength—Good luck—

Name: Yazi
Text: I have underestimated your strength.

Name: Yazi
Text: Now, I shall conduct the final test on behalf of Leader.

Name: Chrome
Text: ...They are the puppets from the performance troupe.

Name: Chrome
Text: But there's probably more to them.

Name: Chrome
Text: Targets eliminated.

Name: Chrome
Text: Do help keep "Yazi" at bay when I get close to the stage...

Name: Chrome
Text: That person on the observation deck...

Name: Chrome
Text: As I expected, there are puppets with attack modules installed amongst the performing puppets.

Name: Yazi
Text: Do not get any closer.

Name: Yazi
Text: Master's wish will soon be realized.

Name: Yazi
Text: You're not going to interrupt...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia, you can't move yet...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Let me fight.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please trust me.

Name: Qu
Text: Almost there.

Name: Qu
Text: Out of my way, Gray Raven!

Name: Qu
Text: If that's the case... I shall take control over this M.I.N.D.

Name: Qu
Text: Huaxu... Give me your power now!

Name: Chrome
Text: What are they talking about...?

Name: Chrome
Text: But right now I have something more important to do...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: ...Please be seated... The following names...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: Will be... activated... by the Kowloong Crew...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: ...The trade fair shall commence once the goods are ready...

Name: Chrome
Text: What's going on...?

Name: Chrome
Text: The space is shifting...

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Support here yet...?

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Divide yourselves into two teams. One'll set up the defenses while the other engages the enemies!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: More Corrupted incoming!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Just us, against that entire horde?!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: As long as we are together, there's nothing to fear. Hold your line!

Name: Bridget
Text: Yes... We have arrived at the defense point of the civilian district.

Name: Bridget
Text: The situation isn't looking good... The Corrupted have already... Dammit! (Hangs off)

Name: Bridget
Text: Hold your line! Watch the surroundings!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Are you the Support Force...?

Name: Bridget
Text: Yes. I'm Bridget, one of the squad leaders of the SF. Sorry, didn't expect them to come so fast.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: I'm the leader of the vanguard squad E... Thanks for your assistance!

Name: Bridget
Text: Let's get through this together!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Jitterbombs detected. Fire!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Jitterbombs are coming at us. Use special bullets against them!

Name: Phecda
Text: All intruders must be exterminated.

Name: Bridget
Text: These bastards! They are attacking anyone that's not one of them!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Your assistance is much appreciated! We managed to suffer only minimum losses.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We can defend this place a bit longer after some rest.

Name: Bridget
Text: But don't push yourselves too hard.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Your assistance is much appreciated! We suffered some losses, but we'll be fine.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We can still fight.

Name: Bridget
Text: The Corrupted will keep coming.

Name: Bridget
Text: I'll get you more reinforcements ASAP.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: That will be great.

Name: Bridget
Text: I'll take the wounded away for now.

Name: Bridget
Text: No way... They have all died...

Name: Bridget
Text: I couldn't even save one of them...

Name: Reinforcement
Text: Boss, the other side's also...

Name: Bridget
Text: Try to retrieve as many frames as possible. There must be something we can do.

Name: Bridget
Text: Let's retreat for now!

Name: Reinforcement
Text: Roger!

Name: α
Text: Lucia, I thought you'd grow under that Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: I did.

Name: α
Text: ...But not enough, Lucia!

Name: Lee
Text: My shots aren't connecting with her... Wait, could she be?!

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...

Name: α
Text: You take on my face. You take on my blade. You take on my voice. Yet you still speak words I've long since left behind.

Name: α
Text: You had your chance.

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia!

Name: α
Text: Now die.

Name: Liv
Text: Incoming Corrupted detected! Wait, no, they're Heteromers!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we have lots of Heteromers coming in!

Name: α
Text: Lamia's work? Sloppy as always...

Name: α
Text: I'll fall back for now...

Name: Liv
Text: The Heteromers are coming!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We got this!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Just focus on the enemies in front of you, folks.

Name: α
Text: Very well then. Both the Corrupted and the Constructs are gone.

Name: α
Text: Nothing stands in our way now.

Name: α
Text: Don't let me down again, Lucia.

Name: Forsaken Member
Text: ...Mr. Watanabe.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Stay vigilant. These Heteromer Cubes are all potential threats.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I'm right, there must be quite a few Corrupted around here... linked to these cubes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They must be the remains of that gravity core... They're adapting to Earth's environment.

Name: Lee
Text: What is this place?

Name: Liv
Text: How gorgeous and well-kept.

Name: Ayla
Text: Looks like we've come to a dead end... Shall we turn back?
No, you face not a dead end.

Name: Lee
Text: Yazi... Why are you here?
No, I am not Yazi.

Name: Liv
Text: What do you mean? Who are you then?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Going back will take your precious time. So if you are after the Ascendants—

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Answer my questions, and you may pass. Of course, you are also welcome to break through with force.

Name: Ayla
Text: Um... Do you know her?

Name: Liv
Text: S-sort of...? (Dry laughter)

Name: Lee
Text: So she's controlling the passage here. Alright.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Are you ready? Let's begin...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: The first question is...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Here comes the second question...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: And the third question is...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Light and shadow are one and the same. Where the light flourishes, the shadow also prospers.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: In the courtyard there is an abundance of light, in the shadows the answer hides.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Show me the "Lightless Veranda" should you seek the truth.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: That is all. Do take your time.

Name: Ayla
Text: What does "lightless" mean...? It's so bright everywhere.

Name: Liv
Text: No. There is one place without light.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, please make your decision.

Name: Ayla
Text: Compared with the other verandas...

Name: Ayla
Text: This one isn't any different...

Name: Lee
Text: Not quite... Just look up...

Name: Ayla
Text: Oh...! I see...!

Name: Liv
Text: This is what differs this veranda from the others.

Name: Ayla
Text: I see... The light isn't on...

Name: Ayla
Text: Is that what "lightless" meant?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Wind flows through the void, traveling to and fro in the courtyard.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: But anchored is your answer, untouched it is by ebbs and flows.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Should you desire the truth, locate the "Chamber of Windrest".

Name: Lee
Text: She said "windrest"... Hmm...

Name: Ayla
Text: Ah, I got it! The wind must stop somewhere!

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, we just have to find a place without wind.

Name: Ayla
Text: I can't put it into words, but...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have a feeling that this is the place.

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm... Looking up close, the wind here is a lot weaker.

Name: Liv
Text: See, the painting is barely moving.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Causes criss-crosses with effect. That which touches this land not, therein your answer lies.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You will find your answer in the "Pavilion of Difference".

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: That which exists here not shall lead you to the pavilion.

Name: Ayla
Text: Did she mention "difference"?

Name: Liv
Text: There are three shades of different machines. Looks like we need to find the correct answer from them...

Name: Lee
Text: One of them is different from the others. Commandant, it's very obvious, don't you think?

Name: Lee
Text: I knew it...

Name: Lee
Text: One of the illusions is different from the rest.

Name: Ayla
Text: Different? What do you mean...

Name: Liv
Text: This Heteromer unit is only seen in Asslam. It doesn't exist in this city.

Name: Liv
Text: That's the "difference" she was talking about.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well. Would you like a compliment?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Defeat the "answer" to complete my challenge.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well. Not many can spot the difference.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Next, you only need to defeat the "answer".

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A splendid display. I have underestimated you.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Go. The "answer" is right ahead.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A pity. You did not understand my message.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: My my. Are you uncultured, or purely daft?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Are you still lost? Yet truth is one and only.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: It's a shame. Though your determination does pique my interest.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well... We shall consider this done.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You have passed my first test.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: In front of you is the guardian of the courtyard.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Defeat it to prove your strength.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A less than satisfactory performance, but, you pass.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Make your way through. Qu is at the top of the tower.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: How unexpected. Truly amazing. Should we have a chat, good people from Babylonia?

Name: Lee
Text: Who are you? I don't feel any hostility from you.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: I am hostile, though perhaps not as much as the others. I'm a member of the Kowloong Crew, after all.

Name: Liv
Text: Kowloong Crew... What's your relationship with those on the Nighter...?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: They replicated our system. On the Nighter, they have nine members.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: But right here in Kowloong, we have nine crews.

Name: Ayla
Text: So... Nine special departments in the city?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You can say that. Plus, not all of us are involved in such reckless warfare.

Name: Lee
Text: So, not everyone's supporting Qu?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: She's only a vessel of the will of the majority. And she knows that.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Anyway, consider this a little nice gesture. I shall waste no more of your time.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: The door is now open. Qu is at the top of the tower. You can go ahead.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: (First Gabriel, and now Gray Raven.)

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: (I'm afraid this planet isn't going your way, Qu.)

Name: α
Text: Automatons from Murmansk? Modded to withstand the virus?

Name: α
Text: I thought you'd bring something to wow me, but... Whatever.

Name: Rosetta
Text: All arctic machines, take on a defensive formation!

Name: α
Text: Hah, finally, something new...

Name: α
Text: Not coming by yourself? Heh. Guess I'll play with your little pets first.

Name: α
Text: Let's see how long your little toys can keep up.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Fierce as always... But you won't get past me!

Name: Luna
Text: Something isn't right here, sister.

Name: α
Text: ...Buying time, aren't you, Rosetta?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Took you long enough to figure that out.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I won't let you pass...!

Name: Challenge 1
Text: Solve the puzzle to move the prism laser together

Name: Challenge 2
Text: Boss fight: Defeat α

Name: Challenge 3
Text: Choose whether to become the leader of Gray Raven or not. Left: Yes; Right: No

Name: Challenge 4
Text: Defeat the incoming monsters

Name: Challenge 5
Text: Avoid the monster's search and get the doll

Name: Intro
Text: Interact with the NPC to start a challenge, then defeat the Boss (entering from Watanabe) to complete it.

Name: Intro
Text: You can get Memory Keys from other NPC challenges, which can be used to open the chest near the spawn point.
Musashi IX is disintegrating!
[The King's Diary #49]
I was attacked by some strange mechanoids while clearing the roof.
I would so like to complain to Cosmos Industries, if only the network is working.
Anyway, better bring a gun when cleaning the cabin in future.
[The King's Diary #1369]
Over a year passed, but I couldn't contact any coast guards at all. Instead, I received an auto-play evacuation warning from the World Government.
It was talking about some "Punishing Virus"? Well, those greedy bastards deserved it.
I'm not going anywhere. Better off playing my games. There's enough food to last me for another life.
[The King's Diary #23]
I don't know what happened... But the guys from the World Government seemed to be gone.
Hmph! Lucky I left some secret doors when building this.
Now I'll shut all the exits. You're never coming in again!
[The King's Diary #641]
I got bored with all the computer games, so I put on a diving suit to check out the optical cable.
The cable looked fine. It must be the server then.
Let me try to start the shortwave radio in the broadcast room. Maybe I can get the coast guards here.
My computer died today when I was playing games. No matter how many times I smashed it, it just wouldn't start.
I lost count of the days. When I got up, I almost forgot I had legs.
I wonder how things are going on the shore? Who knows how many more days I can last?
[ThE k1nG's Di4rY  #*Y&G(&B]
I saw Father at the jetty today, but he had long gone...
Whatever. Can't be helped.
Let me finish the food, then I'll grab a gun to check things out. Damn, this one's rotten. And this one too.

Name: Polar Soldier
Text: A jump to the sky turns into a polar impact!

Name: Lucia
Text: Has my power satisfied you?

Name: Kamui
Text: Ahah, I feel the power pouring in!

Name: Yazi
Text: How could this be...

Name: Lucia
Text: Now isn't the time to be emotional. Let's leave!

Name: Lucia
Text: Our enemies are Construct squadrons. Don't lose your focus!

Name: Kamui
Text: More of them are coming up ahead!

Name: Chrome
Text: We can't let them surround us. Hurry!

Name: Lucia
Text: There's too many of them...

Name: Liv
Text: More enemies, above!

Name: Chrome
Text: Everyone, watch yourselves!

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait... They've dropped their pursuit?

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever, let's just get out of here!

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to get to the meeting point!

Name: Lee
Text: That seems to be one of the entrances that the Corrupted used...

Name: Liv
Text: You're badly wounded... How do you feel?

Name: Construct
Text: No problem at all. I just need a break.

Name: Construct
Text: You keep going where you need to be.

Name: Construct
Text: Don't worry about me. You must go.

Name: Lucia
Text: What's this...?

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like some first-aid tool Kowloong left here. Might come in handy.

Name: Construct
Text: Um, that's...?

Name: Lucia
Text: We found it downstairs. Do you feel better now?

Name: Construct
Text: Saw through my little guise, huh... Thanks, Gray Ravens.

Name: Construct
Text: There are more enemies up ahead. Let me help you.

Name: Lee
Text: They're really putting on the heat.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must get there as soon as possible.

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, we have to save them!

Name: Kamui
Text: I know!

Name: Lamia
Text: I won't stop you from helping them. Hehe...

Name: Lamia
Text: How nice, Babylonian camaraderie.

Name: Kamui
Text: Damn you!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, wait!!

Name: Lamia
Text: Catch me.

Name: Construct
Text: I can walk by myself... You should go after your teammates.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is...

Name: Chrome
Text: The level of Punishing Virus in this frame is already...

Name: Chrome
Text: We are too late...

Name: Construct
Text: Argh... Gargh!!!

Name: Lamia
Text: Oopsies... You took too long.

Name: Kamui
Text: Darn it!!!

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait, Kamui!

Name: Chrome
Text: Sorry... You will not be forgotten.

Name: Kamui
Text: I won't let you run away!

Name: Lamia
Text: ...Here, a freshly infected Prime model. All for you...

Name: Chrome
Text: Is that a guard of Kowloong?

Name: Kamui
Text: You're the only one left, Ascendant!

Name: Lamia
Text: Not quite. Your little friends are still with me.

Name: Kamui
Text: What!?

Name: Lamia
Text: I have quite the party of Babylonia Constructs here. Whether they live or die...

Name: Lamia
Text: Will depend on you...

Name: Construct
Text: Don't worry about us. Keep attacking!

Name: Kamui
Text: No way!

Name: Lamia
Text: What nice people you are... Turn yourselves over then, and they get to live. Don't worry... I keep my promises.

Name: Lamia
Text: After all, even Roland is giving you special attention... Hehe...

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's move the explosives there and detonate it. Kamui, I'll cover you.

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright. Let's get it all done before Lucia arrives!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, there are Corrupted coming!

Name: Chrome
Text: All Corrupted cleared. Let's get started, Kamui.

Name: Kamui
Text: Roger that, Capt.!

Name: Kamui
Text: Those must be the explosives the guards mentioned. I'll go...

Name: Chrome
Text: No, you stay here. I'll go get them.

Name: Kamui
Text: Okay, I'll go check out places to detonate it then!

Name: Chrome
Text: This should be enough. Did you find a good spot, Kamui?

Name: Kamui
Text: All good to go. I'll get the fireworks started!

Name: Chrome
Text: Then I'll take care of the Corrupted coming from behind.

Name: Chrome
Text: The explosives should have worked.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...No, it wasn't enough! The hole is too small!

Name: Chrome
Text: What!?

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt., where are the explosives?

Name: Chrome
Text: I found the authority key to this area. Looks like we can hack into the system and detonate the wall.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hehe, let's quickly finish off these Corrupted then. We can let the system handle the detonation!

Name: Diana
Text: Send all the machines!

Name: α
Text: ...I won't let you lay a finger on Luna.

Name: Diana
Text: We are being outnumbered...

Name: α
Text: Come on stage, princess.

Name: Diana
Text: If that's the case...

Name: Rosetta
Text: No. I'll be your dance partner.
Giant Spider is in great trauma
The desperate Giant Spider suddenly becomes frenzied

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: This is "Broken Blade" calling "Overlord". We have received a red message in the public high-frequency channel. Can you verify? I repeat, can you verify?

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: This is "Broken Blade" calling "Overlord". If we don't hear any reply within an hour...

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: We will engage emergency plan DX-339-1 and activate the plan, code name "Armageddon B".

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: ...If the HQ is already destroyed, God bless you. We will avenge you.
World Government Local Direct Communication Record
We lost the signal of the vanguard! What's going on!?
It's an EMP bomb! Wait, no...!

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: Hill completed the mission with flying colors.

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: He has proven himself worthy of receiving the "evolution".

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: —Identifying audio signal: completed—

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: The human voice has been confirmed. It's Enzo Mantano, code name "Loki". He's on the World Government's Level IV wanted list.
World Government Surface Council Meeting Record
Coulson! Why are you holding AC336 and AC337 orbit teams on the ground?

Name: Coulson
Text: Shut up! I can't let them take off unless you take back that "Ghost" over the Pacific!
That's a classified mission. I have nothing to report to you!

Name: Coulson
Text: Nonsense. My sources show the missiles fired at the launch field came from your "Ghost"!
World Government Surface Council Meeting Record
At this point, aborting Ghost's mission may lead to even worse consequences...

Name: Coulson
Text: Any other "Mister" unhappy with Project Acadia?
At this point in time, they won't be showing it on their faces.

Name: Coulson
Text: ...Either way, we can't afford any more mistakes.
Temporary Meeting Voice Recording

Name: Nikola
Text: ...I saw the report. If we continue the status quo with caution...

Name: Nikola
Text: Can Punishing Resistance cause so much damage on their own?

Name: Nikola
Text: I understand. Forward it to the council.
Beware the monster's backfire effect

Name: Celica
Text: Huaxu enters the Sacred mode and takes significantly less damage from the front.

Name: α
Text: So this is a shrine... Where people used to worship to their god during the Golden Age.

Name: α
Text: Do I really have to wear this...?

Name: α
Text: ...If Luna wants to see it, fine.

Name: α
Text: Gods never exist. Even if they do, they won't be able to save me.

Name: α
Text: But...if only...
Squeak—!

Name: α
Text: Tsk, how annoying!

Name: α
Text: If the so-called gods do exist...

Name: α
Text: Please make Luna safe.

Name: α
Text: Even if it's something that gods can't do, I will make it happen.

Name: α
Text: I must continue. Luna's waiting for me.

Name: α
Text: Almost there.

Name: α
Text: —I only need to get rid of this trash first.

Name: α
Text: I should be able to make it.

Name: α
Text: ...Wait for me. I will be there for you right on the first minute of the new year.

Name: Liv
Text: Phew... Finally, only two areas left to test.

Name: Liv
Text: It was all because Miss Ayla asked us to test the portability of the New Year coating...

Name: Liv
Text: But still...

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, I must stop thinking about random things. Gotta concentrate on the mission!

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla is so good... Her battle is smooth as always.

Name: Liv
Text: I wish I can go to the shrine with my fellow Gray Raven members in this outfit...

Name: Liv
Text: Alright, one final mission left.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm out!

Name: Liv
Text: Oops, it's almost 12 o'clock...!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm not in a shrine, but still...

Name: Liv
Text: Dear God, I wish everybody of Gray Raven can always be together.

Name: Liv
Text: I wish Commandant can be safe and healthy...

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you, dear God.

Name: Liv
Text: Time to go back. They are waiting for me.

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't run!

Name: Chrome
Text: What's happening? Kamui.

Name: Kamui
Text: A few weird mechanoids were carrying something and sneaking around. They ran off the second they saw me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Then I was intercepted by Musashi IX!

Name: Chrome
Text: Musashi IX...? Why is it here?

Name: Chrome
Text: I've never seen this mechanoid. No corruption signal detected... Kamui, what's your status?

Name: Kamui
Text: Tch, we lost sight of it!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, send the image data of that strange mechanoid you met to me.

Name: Kamui
Text: You got it!

Name: Kamui
Text: What's that noise... I'll go check it out!

Name: Chrome
Text: Come back! I need to upload the image data to the system terminal for further analysis...

Name: Kamui
Text: There you are!

Name: Chrome
Text: Stay there and wait for me. Don't do anything rash.

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader! Leader! I'm here!

Name: Kamui
Text: Huh... This is...?

Name: Bianca
Text: But it can still resist wind erosion and manage to maintain its original appearance.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lucia……
彼女はLuciaにしか興味がないらしいです。しかし今のLuciaは……

Name: The other Lucia
Text: 私は大丈夫です……あなたたちは指揮官の傍に……

Name: Lucia
Text: Though it is interesting to see you struggle... My patience still has a limit.

Name: Lucia
Text: Enough... Let us end this farce.

Name: Lee
Text: Kuku, look how fat you are! Let us get some exercise!

Name: Kuku
Text: Ku?

Name: Lee
Text: Leeフの為に頑張りましょうよ。怖くないし、痛くありません。大丈夫。

Name: Kuku
Text: Ku! Kuku, kuku!!

Name: Kuku
Text: Kukukuku...

Name: Lee
Text: This should be small enough now. Alright, job done!

Name: Kuku
Text: Ku...

Name: Elite Corrupted
Text: Urgh—Uuurgh!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa, so many bad boys here. Nanami is a good girl who refuses to use force!

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I should cut more trees quietly without being noticed by them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Go!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm, it looks good, and is far from the Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if my emit some noises, they won’t notice when they’re cutting trees, right?

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay! Start!

Name: Nanami
Text: These guys... they just won’t stop even if they are cutting nothing...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's getting boring. Nanami should bring the Christmas tree back! Bye bye!

Text: <size=30>One!</size>

Text: <size=50>Two!</size>

Text: <size=50>3!</size>

Text: <size=70><color=#ffff00>Go!</color></size>

Text: <size=80><color=#ff0000>Stop!</color></size>

Name: α
Text: If this is how you decided...

Name: α
Text: Come.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please allow me to...

Name: Lee
Text: Beware. There’s something beneath the harbor.

Name: Leeフ
Text: Accessing surveillance data... This is...!?

Name: α
Text: ...The waves are coming faster than expected.

Name: α
Text: I cannot waste time here, the Narwhal is in danger.

Name: α
Text: Connecting to the Ascnet comes with its price, but...

Name: α
Text: You do not have the will for it.

Name: α
Text: Domination, or submission. You are undoubtedly the latter.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This arrogant look...

Name: α
Text: You are already a slave of the Ascnet, Roland...

Name: α
Text: The ascension, failed.

Name: Rosetta
Text: You pitiful Ascendant...! Leave your frame behind!
